summary.span: 在可自定义的网格中显示数据。

span.span: Displays data in a customizable grid.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件提供可自定义的表，用于显示数据。The control provides a customizable table for displaying data. 类允许自定义单元格、 行、 列和通过属性使用的边框，如， ， ，和。The class allows customization of cells, rows, columns, and borders through the use of properties such as , , , and . 有关详细信息，请参阅[基本格式设置和 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的样式](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/basic-formatting-and-styling-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information, see [Basic Formatting and Styling in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/basic-formatting-and-styling-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). 可以使用控件来显示数据，无论基础数据源。You can use a control to display data with or without an underlying data source. 如果不指定数据源，可以创建包含数据并将其直接添加的行和列使用和属性。Without specifying a data source, you can create columns and rows that contain data and add them directly to the using the and properties. 此外可以使用要访问集合对象和属性来直接读取或写入单元格的值。You can also use the collection to access objects and the property to read or write cell values directly. 索引器还提供直接访问权限的单元格。The indexer also provides direct access to cells. 手动填充该控件的替代方法，你可以设置并属性将绑定到数据源，并自动将其填充数据。As an alternative to populating the control manually, you can set the and properties to bind the to a data source and automatically populate it with data. 有关详细信息，请参阅[Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中显示数据](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/displaying-data-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information, see [Displaying Data in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/displaying-data-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). 在使用的数据量非常大，可以设置属性设置为`true`以显示可用数据的子集。When working with very large amounts of data, you can set the property to `true` to display a subset of the available data. 虚拟模式下需要从其的数据缓存实现填充控件。Virtual mode requires the implementation of a data cache from which the control is populated. 有关详细信息，请参阅[Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的数据显示模式](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/data-display-modes-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information, see [Data Display Modes in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/data-display-modes-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). 有关中可用的功能的其他信息控件，请参阅[DataGridView 控件](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/datagridview-control-windows-forms.md)。For additional information about the features available in the control, see [DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/datagridview-control-windows-forms.md). 下表提供了指向常见任务的直接链接。The following table provides direct links to common tasks. - [如何：将数据绑定到 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fbk67b6z\(v=vs.110\).aspx)[How to: Bind Data to the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fbk67b6z\(v=vs.110\).aspx) - [如何：向 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的各个单元格添加工具提示](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/2249cf0a\(v=vs.110\).aspx)[How to: Add ToolTips to Individual Cells in a Windows Forms DataGridView Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/2249cf0a\(v=vs.110\).aspx) - [如何：在 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中设置字体和颜色样式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/z2akwyy7\(v=vs.110\).aspx)[How to: Set Font and Color Styles in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/z2akwyy7\(v=vs.110\).aspx) - [如何：使用设计器更改 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 列类型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/053656ss\(v=vs.110\).aspx)[How to: Change the Type of a Windows Forms DataGridView Column Using the Designer](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/053656ss\(v=vs.110\).aspx) - [如何：使用设计器将数据绑定到 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/33w255ac\(v=vs.110\).aspx)[How to: Bind Data to the Windows Forms DataGridView Control Using the Designer](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/33w255ac\(v=vs.110\).aspx) - [如何：使用设计器设置 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件的默认单元格样式和数据格式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/95y5fz2x\(v=vs.110\).aspx)[How to: Set Default Cell Styles and Data Formats for the Windows Forms DataGridView Control Using the Designer](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/95y5fz2x\(v=vs.110\).aspx) - [如何：在 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中设置数据格式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f9x2790s\(v=vs.110\).aspx)[How to: Format Data in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f9x2790s\(v=vs.110\).aspx) - [演练：在 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中验证数据](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ykdxa0bc\(v=vs.110\).aspx)[Walkthrough: Validating Data in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ykdxa0bc\(v=vs.110\).aspx) - [如何：在 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中自定义数据格式设置](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/z1cc356h\(v=vs.110\).aspx)[How to: Customize Data Formatting in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/z1cc356h\(v=vs.110\).aspx) - [演练：使用两个 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件创建主窗体/详细信息窗体](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/y8c0cxey\(v=vs.110\).aspx)[Walkthrough: Creating a Master/Detail Form Using Two Windows Forms DataGridView Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/y8c0cxey\(v=vs.110\).aspx) 尽管控件替换并添加了功能的早期版本中，控制以备向后兼容性和将来使用保留控件，如果您选择。Although the control replaces and adds functionality to the control of previous versions, the control is retained for both backward compatibility and future use if you choose. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件与 DataGrid 控件之间的区别](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/differences-between-the-windows-forms-datagridview-and-datagrid-controls.md)。For more information, see [Differences Between the Windows Forms DataGridView and DataGrid Controls](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/differences-between-the-windows-forms-datagridview-and-datagrid-controls.md). > [!NOTE] > 控件要继承两者并中的属性，但仅支持属性。The control inherits both the and properties from , but supports only the property. 使用具有属性控件不起作用。Using the property with the control has no effect. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何初始化一个未绑定控件。The following code example demonstrates how to initialize an unbound control. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSimpleUnbound#00](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSimpleUnbound/CS/simpleunbound.cs#00)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSimpleUnbound#00](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSimpleUnbound/VB/simpleunbound.vb#00)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将转换到指定的行和列索引`objectID`并`childID`参数并调用两次使用方法重载并的值枚举。This method converts the specified row and column indexes into `objectID` and `childID` parameters and calls the method overload twice using the and values of the enumeration. `objectID`和`childID`由它们的显示顺序，它们是否可见，且从 1 开始计数的行或列的标头中编号可见的行和列。The `objectID` and `childID` are determined by numbering only the visible rows and columns in their display order, counting the row or column headers if they are visible, and starting with 1. 例如，如果列标题可见，`objectID`行的第一个可见非标头为 2。For example, if column headers are visible, the `objectID` for the first visible nonheader row is 2.

exception.span: 的 属性值小于 0 或大于控件中的列数减 1。

exception.span: 的 属性值小于 0 或大于控件中的行数减 1。

span.span: The value of the property of is less than 0 or greater than the number of rows in the control minus 1.

para.span: 自定义时重写此方法控件并修改当前的单元格如何以及何时更改。

span.span: Override this method when customizing the control and modifying how and when the current cell changes.

para.span: 例如，如果创建将多个单元格合并到单个单元格的自定义行类型，并相应地修改的导航，可以重写此方法以提供辅助功能支持所做的更改。

span.span: For example, if you create a custom row type that merges multiple cells into single cells and you modify the navigation accordingly, you can override this method to provide accessibility support for your changes.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否允许通过手动对列重新定位。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether manual column repositioning is enabled.

value.span: 如果用户可以更改列的顺序，为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the user can change the column order; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当启用列重新定位时，用户可以将列标题拖到新位置。When column repositioning is enabled, users can drag a column header to a new position. 请注意，冻结和未冻结的列形成两个单独的组;用户可以重新定位组内的列，但不能将列从一个组移到其他。Note that frozen and unfrozen columns form two separate groups; users can reposition columns within a group, but cannot move a column from one group to the other. > [!NOTE] > 控件不支持双缓冲。The control does not support double buffering. 如果设置为`true`中派生控件，用户将不会收到可视反馈，或对列重新排序时调整行、 列或标头的大小。If is set to `true` in a derived control, users will not receive visual feedback when resizing rows, columns, or headers or when reordering columns. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此属性在主要用于显示控件。The following code example illustrates the use of this property in a control intended primarily for display. 在此示例中，以下几种方式自定义控件的可视外观和控件配置为有限的交互。In this example, the visual appearance of the control is customized in several ways and the control is configured for limited interactivity. 此示例摘自一个更大的示例中提供类概述。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview. summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示用户是否可以调整列的大小。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether users can resize columns.

value.span: 如果用户可以调整列的大小，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if users can resize columns; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性用于防止用户手动更改列宽度。Use this property to prevent users from manually changing column widths. 这非常有用，例如，仅显示列，一次加载数据并且列的大小在该时间。This is useful, for example, with display-only columns where data is loaded once and columns are resized at that time. 有关用户调整大小的详细信息，请参阅[Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中调整大小选项](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about user resizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). > [!NOTE] > 控件不支持双缓冲。The control does not support double buffering. 如果设置为`true`中派生控件，用户将不会收到可视反馈，或对列重新排序时调整行、 列或标头的大小。If is set to `true` in a derived control, users will not receive visual feedback when resizing rows, columns, or headers or when reordering columns. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了如何使用此属性在主要用于显示控件。The following code example illustrates how to use this property in a control intended primarily for display. 在此示例中，以下几种方式自定义控件的可视外观和控件配置为有限的交互。In this example, the visual appearance of the control is customized in several ways and the control is configured for limited interactivity. 此示例摘自一个更大的示例中提供类概述。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性用于防止用户手动更改行高。Use this property to prevent users from manually changing row heights. 这很有用，例如，与仅显示控件，一次加载数据并且行的大小在该时间。This is useful, for example, with display-only controls where data is loaded once and rows are resized at that time. 对于行调整大小时换行为多行的单元格内容，必须具有的单元格样式属性值为。For cell contents to wrap onto multiple lines when a row is resized, the cell style in effect for the cell must have a property value of . 有关用户调整大小的详细信息，请参阅[Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中调整大小选项](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about user resizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). > [!NOTE] > 控件不支持双缓冲。The control does not support double buffering. 如果设置为`true`中派生控件，用户将不会收到可视反馈，或对列重新排序时调整行、 列或标头的大小。If is set to `true` in a derived control, users will not receive visual feedback when resizing rows, columns, or headers or when reordering columns. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了如何使用此属性在主要用于显示控件。The following code example illustrates how to use this property in a control intended primarily for display. 在此示例中，以下几种方式自定义控件的可视外观和控件配置为有限的交互。In this example, the visual appearance of the control is customized in several ways and the control is configured for limited interactivity. 此示例摘自一个更大的示例中提供类概述。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview. summary.span: 获取或设置应用于 的奇数行的默认单元格样式。

span.span: Gets or sets the default cell style applied to odd-numbered rows of the .

value.span: 一个应用于奇数行的 。

span.span: A to apply to the odd-numbered rows.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件显示其使用指示单元格的样式的单元格属性，它继承自其他类型的属性的样式。The control displays its cells using the styles indicated by the cell property, which inherits styles from other properties of type . 通过指定的样式中具有奇数的索引号的行的单元格，为属性重写通过指定的样式， ，和，并通过指定的样式重写和属性。For cells in rows with odd index numbers, the styles specified through the property override the styles specified through the , , and , and are overridden by the styles specified through the and properties. 有关详细信息，请参阅[Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的单元格样式](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/cell-styles-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information, see [Cell Styles in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/cell-styles-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). 获取此属性时如果属性尚未被访问，则将创建带有默认值。When getting this property, a with default values will be created if the property has not already been accessed. 获取此属性为多个行时，这会导致对性能产生影响。This can cause a performance impact when getting this property for many rows. 只要有可能，使用单个设置此属性的多个行。Whenever possible, use a single to set this property for multiple rows. 有关详细信息，请参阅[缩放 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件的最佳做法](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了如何使用此属性来创建在分类帐效果控件。The following code example illustrates how to use this property to create a ledger effect in a control. 此示例摘自一个更大的示例中提供类概述。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewStyleDemo#20](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewStyleDemo/CS/form1.cs#20)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewStyleDemo#20](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewStyleDemo/VB/form1.vb#20)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool AutoGenerateColumns { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.AutoGenerateColumns : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示在设置 或 属性时是否自动创建列。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether columns are created automatically when the or properties are set.

value.span: 如果应自动创建列，为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the columns should be created automatically; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当此属性设置为自动生成列`true`并或设置或更改属性。Columns are automatically generated when this property is set to `true` and the or properties are set or changed. 列也可以为自动时生成属性更改从`false`到`true`。Columns can also be automatically generated when the property is changed from `false` to `true`. 如果此属性为`true`并更改，以使有不匹配的上一个列的列值，不匹配的列中的数据将被丢弃。If this property is `true` and the changes so there are columns that do not match the columns of the previous value, data in the unmatched columns is discarded. 如果忽略此属性或未设置的属性。This property is ignored if the or properties are not set. 当设置为`true`，则控件数据源中生成一列对应的对象的每个公共属性。When is set to `true`, the control generates one column for each public property of the objects in the data source. 如果绑定的对象实现接口，该控件生成的每个属性返回的一列方法。If the bound objects implement the interface, the control generates one column for each property returned by the method. 每个列标题将包含列表示属性名称的值。Each column header will contain the value of the property name the column represents. 如果您设置属性，但不是集到`false`，您必须手动添加的列。If you set the property but set to `false`, you must add columns manually. 您可以通过设置将每个添加的列绑定到数据源属性设置为绑定对象所公开的属性的名称。You can bind each added column to the data source by setting the property to the name of a property exposed by the bound objects. > [!NOTE] > 设置在 Windows 窗体设计器中自动设置属性设置为`false`和生成代码，以添加并将绑定数据源中每个属性的列。Setting the in the Windows Forms Designer automatically sets the property to `false` and generates code to add and bind a column for each property in the data source. 在设计时生成的代码等效于以下示例所示的手动添加代码。The code that is generated at design-time is equivalent to the manually added code shown in the following example. 不是在运行时出现的列自动生成相同时属性设置为`true`。It is not the same as the auto-generation of columns at run-time that occurs when the property is set to `true`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何手动添加列并将其绑定到数据源设置时到`false`。The following code example demonstrates how to add columns manually and bind them to a data source when you set to `false`. 在此示例中，控件绑定到一系列`Task`业务对象。In this example, a control is bound to a list of `Task` business objects. 然后，添加列，并绑定到`Task`属性通过属性。Then, columns are added and are bound to `Task` properties through the property. 此示例中提供一个更大示例摘自[如何： 访问 Windows 窗体 DataGridViewComboBoxCell 下拉列表中的对象](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/access-objects-in-a-wf-datagridviewcomboboxcell-drop-down-list.md)。This example is part of a larger example available in [How to: Access Objects in a Windows Forms DataGridViewComboBoxCell Drop-Down List](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/access-objects-in-a-wf-datagridviewcomboboxcell-drop-down-list.md). summary.span: 调整指定列的宽度以适应其所有单元格（包括标题单元格）的内容。

span.span: Adjusts the width of the specified column to fit the contents of all its cells, including the header cell.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法很有用，如果您要控制调整列的大小。This method is useful if you want to control when a column resizes. 每个方法调用; 一次调整列宽度如果列更高版本的内容更改，则该列将不会自动调整。The column width is adjusted only once per method call; if the contents of the column later change, the column will not automatically adjust. 若要调整大小的所有列，请使用方法。To resize all columns, use the method. 若要设置其内容更改时自动调整大小的列，请使用属性或列属性。To set the column to automatically resize whenever its contents change, use the property or the column property. 有关以编程方式调整大小的详细信息，请参阅[Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中调整大小选项](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about programmatic resizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用此方法以使足够大以容纳新单元值的列宽度。The following code example uses this method to make the column width large enough to accommodate a new cell value. 此示例中提供一个更大示例摘自[如何： 操作 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的行](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-manipulate-rows-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。This example is part of a larger example available in [How to: Manipulate Rows in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-manipulate-rows-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法很有用，如果您要控制调整列的大小。This method is useful if you want to control when a column resizes. 每个方法调用; 一次调整列宽度如果列更高版本的内容更改，则该列将不会自动调整。The column width is adjusted only once per method call; if the contents of the column later change, the column will not automatically adjust. 若要调整大小的所有列，请使用方法。To resize all columns, use the method. 若要设置其内容更改时自动调整大小的列，请使用属性或列属性。To set the column to automatically resize whenever its contents change, use the property or the column property. 此重载允许您指定计算新宽度基于一组有限的单元格，如显示的行中的值的大小调整模式。This overload lets you specify a sizing mode that calculates the new width based on values in a limited set of cells, such as those in displayed rows only. 当该控件包含大量行时，这可以提高性能。This improves performance when the control contains a large number of rows. 有关以编程方式调整大小的详细信息，请参阅[Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中调整大小选项](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about programmatic resizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用此方法以使足够大以容纳新单元值的列宽度。The following code example uses this method to make the column width large enough to accommodate a new cell value. 此示例中提供一个更大示例摘自[如何： 操作 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的行](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-manipulate-rows-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。This example is part of a larger example available in [How to: Manipulate Rows in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-manipulate-rows-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法很有用，如果您要控制调整列的大小。This method is useful if you want to control when a column resizes. 每个方法调用; 一次调整列宽度如果列更高版本的内容更改，则该列将不会自动调整。The column width is adjusted only once per method call; if the contents of the column later change, the column will not automatically adjust. 若要调整大小的所有列，请使用方法。To resize all columns, use the method. 若要设置其内容更改时自动调整大小的列，请使用属性或列属性。To set the column to automatically resize whenever its contents change, use the property or the column property. 此重载允许您指定计算新宽度基于一组有限的单元格，如显示的行中的值的大小调整模式。This overload lets you specify a sizing mode that calculates the new width based on values in a limited set of cells, such as those in displayed rows only. 当该控件包含大量行时，这可以提高性能。This improves performance when the control contains a large number of rows. 此重载受到保护，它旨在使您能够实现理想的单元格高度为宽度比率中派生类。This overload is protected and is designed to enable you to achieve ideal cell height-to-width ratios in a derived class. 如果`fixedHeight`是`false`，将会调用的假定条件下计算列宽度或方法下一步。If `fixedHeight` is `false`, the column width will be calculated with the expectation that you will call the or method next. 有关以编程方式调整大小的详细信息，请参阅[Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中调整大小选项](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about programmatic resizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法很有用，如果您要控制列标题重设大小。This method is useful if you want to control when the column headers resize. 每个方法调用; 一次调整列标题的高度如果后来更改标头，列该列标头将的内容不会自动调整。The height of the column headers is adjusted only once per method call; if the contents of the column headers later change, the column headers will not automatically adjust. 若要设置要在其内容更改时自动调整大小的列标头，使用属性。To set the column headers to automatically resize when their contents change, use the property. 若要调整列标题换行为多行的单元格内容，必须具有的单元格样式属性值为。For cell contents to wrap onto multiple lines when the column headers are resized, the cell style in effect for the cell must have a property value of . 有关以编程方式调整大小的详细信息，请参阅[Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中调整大小选项](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about programmatic resizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了如何调整列标题的大小并单击某个按钮后的行。The following code example demonstrates how to resize column headers and rows as a result of a button click. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法很有用，如果您要控制列标题重设大小。This method is useful if you want to control when the column headers resize. 每个方法调用; 一次调整列标题的高度如果后来更改标头，列该列标头将的内容不会自动调整。The height of the column headers is adjusted only once per method call; if the contents of the column headers later change, the column headers will not automatically adjust. 若要设置要在其内容更改时自动调整大小的列标头，使用属性。To set the column headers to automatically resize when their contents change, use the property. 若要调整列标题换行为多行的单元格内容，必须具有的单元格样式属性值为。For cell contents to wrap onto multiple lines when the column headers are resized, the cell style in effect for the cell must have a property value of . 此重载受到保护，它旨在使您能够实现理想的单元格高度为宽度比率中派生类。This overload is protected and is designed to enable you to achieve ideal cell height-to-width ratios in a derived class. 如果`fixedColumnsWidth`或`fixedRowHeadersWidth`参数是`false`，将会如调用方法的假定条件下计算列标题的高度和下一步。If the `fixedColumnsWidth` or `fixedRowHeadersWidth` parameters are `false`, the height of the column headers will be calculated with the expectation that you will call the methods such as and next. 有关以编程方式调整大小的详细信息，请参阅[Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中调整大小选项](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about programmatic resizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).

span.span: Adjusts the height of the column headers based on changes to the contents of the header in the specified column, optionally calculating the height with the expectation that the column and/or row header widths will subsequently be adjusted.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法很有用，如果您要控制列标题进行大小调整只会到绑定的数据源中指定列的标头的内容更改用户编辑或更改的结果。This method is useful if you want to control when the column headers resize if only the contents of the header in the specified column have changed as a result of user edits or changes to a bound data source. 列标题的高度被调整一次每个方法调用如果内容的更改需要它;如果后来更改标头，列该列标头将的内容不会自动调整。The height of the column headers is adjusted only once per method call if the content change requires it; if the contents of the column headers later change, the column headers will not automatically adjust. 若要设置要在其内容更改时自动调整大小的列标头，使用属性。To set the column headers to automatically resize when their contents change, use the property. 若要调整列标题换行为多行的单元格内容，必须具有的单元格样式属性值为。For cell contents to wrap onto multiple lines when the column headers are resized, the cell style in effect for the cell must have a property value of . 此重载受到保护，它旨在使您能够实现理想的单元格高度为宽度比率中派生类。This overload is protected and is designed to enable you to achieve ideal cell height-to-width ratios in a derived class. 如果`fixedColumnWidth`或`fixedRowHeadersWidth`参数是`false`，将会如调用方法的假定条件下计算列标题的高度和下一步。If the `fixedColumnWidth` or `fixedRowHeadersWidth` parameters are `false`, the height of the column headers will be calculated with the expectation that you will call the methods such as and next. 有关以编程方式调整大小的详细信息，请参阅[Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中调整大小选项](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about programmatic resizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).

exception.span: 不在 0 到列数减 1 的有效范围内。

span.span: is not in the valid range of 0 to the number of columns minus 1.

summary.span: 调整所有列的宽度以适应其所有单元格（包括标题单元格）的内容。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法很有用，如果您要控制列调整大小。This method is useful if you want to control when columns resize. 每个方法调用; 一次调整列宽如果列更高版本的内容更改，则列将不会自动调整。The column widths are adjusted only once per method call; if the contents of the columns later change, the columns will not automatically adjust. 若要调整大小的特定列，请使用方法。To resize a specific column, use the method. 若要设置其内容更改时自动调整大小的列，请使用属性或列属性。To set the columns to automatically resize whenever their contents change, use the property or the column property. 有关以编程方式调整大小的详细信息，请参阅[Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中调整大小选项](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about programmatic resizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例调整所有列调整为合适的列标题和列标题内容的都大小。The following code example resizes all columns to fit the contents of the columns and the column headers. 此代码示例摘自[如何： 以编程方式调整大小以适应内容 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的单元格](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/programmatically-resize-cells-to-fit-content-in-the-datagrid.md)。This code example is part of a larger example provided in [How to: Programmatically Resize Cells to Fit Content in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/programmatically-resize-cells-to-fit-content-in-the-datagrid.md). summary.span: 使用指定的大小调整模式，基于指定行中标题内容的更改调整行标题的宽度。

span.span: Adjusts the width of the row headers based on changes to the contents of the header in the specified row and using the specified size mode.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法很有用，如果您要控制行标题进行大小调整只会到绑定的数据源中的指定行的标头的内容更改用户编辑或更改的结果。This method is useful if you want to control when the row headers resize if only the contents of the header in the specified row have changed as a result of user edits or changes to a bound data source. 行标题的宽度调整一次每个方法调用的内容更改的需要;如果后来更改标头，行一行标头将的内容不会自动调整。The width of the row headers is adjusted only once per method call if the content change requires it; if the contents of the row headers later change, the row headers will not automatically adjust. 若要设置行标题自动调整大小在其内容更改时，使用属性。To set the row headers to automatically resize when their contents change, use the property. 此方法允许您指定计算新宽度基于一组有限的标头，如显示的行中的值的大小调整模式。This method lets you specify a sizing mode that calculates the new width based on values in a limited set of headers, such as those in displayed rows only. 当该控件包含大量行时，这可以提高性能。This improves performance when the control contains a large number of rows. 有关以编程方式调整大小的详细信息，请参阅[Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中调整大小选项](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about programmatic resizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明了如何调整行标题的宽度基于第一个行标头的内容更改的大小。The following code example illustrates how to resize the row header widths based on changes to the contents of the first row header. 此代码示例摘自[如何： 以编程方式调整大小以适应内容 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的单元格](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/programmatically-resize-cells-to-fit-content-in-the-datagrid.md)。This code example is part of a larger example provided in [How to: Programmatically Resize Cells to Fit Content in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/programmatically-resize-cells-to-fit-content-in-the-datagrid.md). [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ProgrammaticResizing#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ProgrammaticResizing/CPP/programmaticsizing.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ProgrammaticResizing#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ProgrammaticResizing/CS/programmaticsizing.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ProgrammaticResizing#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ProgrammaticResizing/VB/programmaticsizing.vb#5)]

summary.span: 使用指定的大小调整模式调整行标题的宽度，还可以选择在行和/或列标题的高度随后进行调整的假定条件下计算宽度。

span.span: Adjusts the width of the row headers using the specified size mode, optionally calculating the width with the expectation that the row and/or column header widths will subsequently be adjusted.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法很有用，如果您要控制行标题重设大小。This method is useful if you want to control when the row headers resize. 每个方法调用; 一次调整行标题的宽度如果后来更改标头，行一行标头将的内容不会自动调整。The width of the row headers is adjusted only once per method call; if the contents of the row headers later change, the row headers will not automatically adjust. 若要设置行标题自动调整大小在其内容更改时，使用属性。To set the row headers to automatically resize when their contents change, use the property. 此方法允许您指定计算新宽度基于一组有限的标头，如显示的行中的值的大小调整模式。This method lets you specify a sizing mode that calculates the new width based on values in a limited set of headers, such as those in displayed rows only. 当该控件包含大量行时，这可以提高性能。This improves performance when the control contains a large number of rows. 此重载受到保护，它旨在使您能够实现理想的单元格高度为宽度比率中派生类。This overload is protected and is designed to enable you to achieve ideal cell height-to-width ratios in a derived class. 如果`fixedColumnHeadersHeight`或`fixedRowsHeight`参数是`false`，将会如调用方法的假定条件下计算行标题的宽度和下一步。If the `fixedColumnHeadersHeight` or `fixedRowsHeight` parameters are `false`, the width of the row headers will be calculated with the expectation that you will call methods such as and next. 有关以编程方式调整大小的详细信息，请参阅[Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中调整大小选项](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about programmatic resizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 调整所有行的高度以适应其所有单元格（包括标题单元格）的内容。

span.span: Adjusts the heights of all rows to fit the contents of all their cells, including the header cells.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法很有用，如果您要控制调整行大小。This method is useful if you want to control when rows resize. 每个方法调用; 一次调整行高如果行更高版本的内容更改，则行将不会自动调整。The row heights are adjusted only once per method call; if the contents of the rows later change, the rows will not automatically adjust. 若要调整大小的特定行，请使用方法。To resize a specific row, use the method. 若要调整大小的行的子集，请使用重载。To resize a subset of rows, use the overload. 若要设置其内容更改时自动调整大小的行，使用属性。To set the rows to automatically resize whenever their contents change, use the property. 对于行调整大小时换行为多行的单元格内容，必须具有的单元格样式属性值为。For cell contents to wrap onto multiple lines when a row is resized, the cell style in effect for the cell must have a property value of . 有关以编程方式调整大小的详细信息，请参阅[Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中调整大小选项](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about programmatic resizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重设大小基于非标头单元格内容的所有行。The following code example demonstrates how to resize all rows based on non-header cell content. 此代码示例摘自[如何： 以编程方式调整大小以适应内容 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的单元格](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/programmatically-resize-cells-to-fit-content-in-the-datagrid.md)。This code example is part of a larger example provided in [How to: Programmatically Resize Cells to Fit Content in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/programmatically-resize-cells-to-fit-content-in-the-datagrid.md). remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法很有用，如果你想要控制时调整行大小，但你想要重设大小仅特定行的子集，例如那些绑定已更新的记录的范围内。This method is useful if you want to control when rows resize, but you want to resize only a specific subset of rows, such as those within a range of bound records that have been updated. 每个方法调用; 一次调整指定行的行高度如果行更高版本的内容更改，则行将不会自动调整。The row heights for the specified rows are adjusted only once per method call; if the contents of the rows later change, the rows will not automatically adjust. 若要调整大小的特定行，请使用方法。To resize a specific row, use the method. 若要调整大小的所有行，请使用的不同重载方法。To resize all rows, use a different overload of the method. 若要设置其内容更改时自动调整大小的行，使用属性。To set the rows to automatically resize whenever their contents change, use the property. 对于行调整大小时换行为多行的单元格内容，必须具有的单元格样式属性值为。For cell contents to wrap onto multiple lines when a row is resized, the cell style in effect for the cell must have a property value of . 此重载允许您指定计算新高度基于一组有限的单元格，如显示的行中的值的大小调整模式。This overload lets you specify a sizing mode that calculates the new heights based on values in a limited set of cells, such as those in displayed rows only. 当该控件包含大量行时，这可以提高性能。This improves performance when the control contains a large number of rows. 此重载受到保护，它旨在使您能够实现理想的单元格高度为宽度比率中派生类。This overload is protected and is designed to enable you to achieve ideal cell height-to-width ratios in a derived class. 如果`fixedWidth`参数是`false`，将会调用的假定条件下计算行高或方法下一步。If the `fixedWidth` parameter is `false`, the row heights will be calculated with the expectation that you will call the or method next. 有关以编程方式调整大小的详细信息，请参阅[Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中调整大小选项](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about programmatic resizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating how column widths are determined.

value.span: 一个 值。

span.span: A value.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性可以配置该控件，以便以填充该控件，或以适应单元格内容自动调整列宽。This property lets you configure the control so that column widths are automatically adjusted either to fill the control or to fit cell contents. 当发生更改时控件的宽度，则将发生大小调整填充模式中。Size adjustments occur in fill mode whenever the width of the control changes. 在基于内容的大小调整模式下，大小调整单元格内容更改时，或者会发生，启用后，每当行高发生更改时。In content-based sizing modes, size adjustments occur whenever cell contents change or, if is enabled, whenever row heights change. 某些基于内容的大小调整模式，可以将限制到当前显示的行的大小调整，以提高性能。Some content-based sizing modes let you limit the size adjustment to the currently displayed rows in order to increase performance. 若要更改的单个列的大小调整模式，设置其属性。To change the sizing mode for an individual column, set its property. 此属性的默认值是，，该值指示此列将继承其行为并将其从控件的属性值。The default value of this property is , indicating that the column inherits its behavior and its property value from the control. 在填充模式列将通过所指示的比例的可用控件宽度划分其属性值。Columns in fill mode divide the available control width in proportions indicated by their property values. 通过减去从控件的客户端区域的宽度的所有其他列的宽度来确定可用于填充模式的宽度。The width available for fill mode is determined by subtracting the widths of all other columns from the width of the client area of the control. 如果此宽度小于组合所有填充模式列的值，显示水平滚动条，所有填充模式列在都显示时带有其最小宽度，并且用户列重设大小被禁用。If this width is smaller than the combined values of all fill-mode columns, the horizontal scroll bar is displayed, all fill-mode columns are shown with their minimum widths, and user column-resizing is disabled. 有关列填充模式的详细信息，请参阅[Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的列填充模式](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/column-fill-mode-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about column fill mode, see [Column Fill Mode in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/column-fill-mode-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). 只能对列属性值为`true`自动调整大小和更改的列可见性不会调整大小时发生。Only columns with a property value of `true` are resized automatically, and changing the visibility of a column does not cause resizing to occur. 此外，如果将列设置为自动调整大小，用户不能调整的列宽度，用鼠标。Additionally, when columns are set to automatically resize, the user cannot adjust the column widths with the mouse. 若要以编程方式调整列宽度，请使用或方法，或者设置列属性。To adjust column widths programmatically, use the or methods or set the column property. 有关基于内容的自动调整大小的详细信息，请参阅[Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中调整大小选项](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about content-based automatic sizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了如何在母版/详细信息方案中使用此属性，其中两个控件显示两个表中的数据中的父/子关系。The following code example illustrates how to use this property in a master/detail scenario where two controls display data from two tables in a parent/child relationship. 在此示例中，主控件的列大小调整模式是，并以编程方式初始化的列宽度，以适应加载的值。In this example, the column sizing mode for the master control is , and the column widths are programmatically initialized to fit the loaded values. 详细信息控件设置为自动列大小调整模式，以便每当值发生更改 （例如，当用户更改父表中的当前行） 时，列将自动调整。The details control is set to an automatic column sizing mode so that columns will adjust automatically whenever the values change (for example, when the user changes the current row in the parent table). 此示例中提供一个更大示例摘自[如何： 创建母版/详细信息窗体使用两个 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/create-a-master-detail-form-using-two-datagridviews.md)。This example is part of a larger example available in [How to: Create a Master/Detail Form Using Two Windows Forms DataGridView Controls](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/create-a-master-detail-form-using-two-datagridviews.md). [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMasterDetails#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMasterDetails/CS/masterdetails.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMasterDetails#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMasterDetails/VB/masterdetails.vb#10)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性可以配置该控件，使行高度自动调整以适应其内容的内容更改时。This property lets you configure the control so that row heights are automatically adjusted to fit their contents whenever the contents change. 如果是启用，行高也会进行调整列宽更改时。If is enabled, row heights are also adjusted whenever column widths change. 某些大小调整模式，可以将限制到当前显示的行的大小调整，以提高性能。Some sizing modes let you limit the size adjustment to the currently displayed rows in order to increase performance. 仅使用行属性值为`true`自动调整大小和更改行的可见性不会调整大小时发生。Only rows with a property value of `true` are resized automatically, and changing the visibility of a row does not cause resizing to occur. 此外，在行设置为自动调整大小，用户不能调整行高使用鼠标。Additionally, when rows are set to automatically resize, the user cannot adjust the row heights with the mouse. 自动调整大小的行的值重新计算期间要使用的字体的大小布局。The value of an automatically sized row is recalculated during layout to account for the size of the font that is used. 若要获取正确，应在窗体的中值检索而不是在窗体的构造函数中的事件。To get the correct , you should retrieve the value in the form's event instead of in the form's constructor. 若要以编程方式调整行高，请使用或方法，或者设置行属性。To adjust row heights programmatically, use the or methods, or set the row property. 对于行调整大小时换行为多行的单元格内容，必须具有的单元格样式属性值为。For cell contents to wrap onto multiple lines when a row is resized, the cell style in effect for the cell must have a property value of . 有关基于内容的自动调整大小的详细信息，请参阅[Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中调整大小选项](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about content-based automatic sizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将行设置为基于行标题和的所有列的内容自动调整大小。The following code example demonstrates how to set the row to automatically resize based on the contents of the row headers and all of the columns. 此代码示例摘自[如何： 自动调整大小的单元格时的内容更改 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/automatically-resize-cells-when-content-changes-in-the-datagrid.md)。This code example is part of a larger example provided in [How to: Automatically Resize Cells When Content Changes in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/automatically-resize-cells-when-content-changes-in-the-datagrid.md). remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法返回`false`该单元格无法进入编辑模式，这种情况的原因有多。This method returns `false` if the cell fails to enter edit mode, which can happen for a number of reasons. 此方法返回`false`如果当前单元格是只读的。This method returns `false` if the current cell is read-only. 它还会返回`false`如果该单元格属性是`null`（这意味着该单元格不能承载编辑控件） 和单元格类型未实现接口。It also returns `false` if the cell property is `null` (meaning the cell cannot host an editing control) and the cell type does not implement the interface. 如果该单元格支持编辑，此方法将引发事件，它都可以取消，并返回`false`如果事件处理程序取消编辑。If the cell supports editing, this method raises the event, which can be canceled, and returns `false` if an event handler cancels the edit. 如果未取消编辑，并且该单元格可以托管一个编辑控件，此方法初始化该控件，并显示它。If the edit is not canceled and the cell can host an editing control, this method initializes the control and displays it. 如果初始化失败，此方法返回`false`。If the initialization fails, this method returns `false`. 如果该单元格成功进入编辑模式属性返回`true`。If the cell successfully enters edit mode, the property returns `true`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此方法。The following code example demonstrates the use of this method. MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event CancelRowEdit As QuestionEventHandler

summary.span: 在 控件的 属性为 并且取消行中的编辑时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the property of a control is and the cancels edits in a row.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当是处于虚拟模式下，更改都将提交到单元格级别的数据缓存默认情况下。When the is in virtual mode, changes are committed to the data cache at the cell level by default. 实现行级事务时，可以使用事件。The event can be used when implementing row-level transactions. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了如何处理此事件处于虚拟模式下的控件。The following code example illustrates how to handle this event for a control in virtual mode. 当控件处于编辑模式`rowInEdit`变量保存所编辑的行的索引和`customerInEdit`变量保存到一个对应于该行的客户对象的引用。When the control is in edit mode, the `rowInEdit` variable holds the index of the row being edited, and the `customerInEdit` variable holds a reference to a Customer object corresponding to that row. 当用户取消退出编辑模式时，此对象会被丢弃。When the user cancels out of edit mode, this object can be discarded. 如果用户正在编辑的行是用于新记录的行，但是，丢弃旧的客户对象的值，并将替换为一个新，以便用户可以开始再次进行编辑。If the row the user was editing is the row for new records, however, the old Customer object is discarded and replaced with a new one so that the user can begin making edits again. 此示例中提供一个更大示例摘自[演练： 在 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中实现虚拟模式](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/implementing-virtual-mode-wf-datagridview-control.md)。This example is part of a larger example available in [Walkthrough: Implementing Virtual Mode in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/implementing-virtual-mode-wf-datagridview-control.md). [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode#170](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode/CPP/virtualmode.cpp#170)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode#170](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode/CS/virtualmode.cs#170)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode#170](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode/VB/virtualmode.vb#170)]

span.span: DataGridView Control (Windows Forms)

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event CellClick As DataGridViewCellEventHandler

summary.span: 在单元格的任何部分被单击时发生。

span.span: Occurs when any part of a cell is clicked.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 单击单元格的任何部分，包括边框和填充时发生此事件。This event occurs when any part of a cell is clicked, including borders and padding. 它也会发生在用户按下并释放了 SPACE 键时将按钮单元格或复选框单元格有焦点，并将发生两次以这些单元格类型，如果按空间键时，在单击单元格时。It also occurs when the user presses and releases the SPACE key while a button cell or check box cell has focus, and will occur twice for these cell types if the cell is clicked while pressing the SPACE key. 若要确定在单击单元格内容时，处理事件。To determine when the cell contents are clicked, handle the event. 此事件不会接收有关鼠标位置的信息。This event does not receive information about the mouse position. 如果事件处理程序需要有关鼠标位置的信息，请使用事件。If the event handler needs information about the mouse position, use the event. 在单击，此事件发生之前的复选框更改值，因此，如果不想计算基于当前值的预期值，通常将处理事件相反。For clicks in a , this event occurs before the check box changes value, so if you do not want to calculate the expected value based on the current value, you will typically handle the event instead. 因为发生了该事件的用户指定值时才提交，这通常会发生当焦点离开该单元格，则还必须处理事件。Because that event occurs only when the user-specified value is committed, which typically occurs when focus leaves the cell, you must also handle the event. 在该处理程序，如果当前单元格是一个复选框单元格，则调用方法并传入值。In that handler, if the current cell is a check box cell, call the method and pass in the value. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示事件处理程序中使用图像列中的井字棋游戏实现控件。The following code example shows a event handler in a Tic-Tac-Toe game implementation that uses image columns in a control. 除非该游戏已结束，或该单元格已被单击事件处理程序会将单元格的值设置为一的两个变量所表示的对象`x`和`o`。Unless the game is over or the cell has already been clicked, the event handler sets the cell value to one of two objects represented by the variables `x` and `o`. 此代码摘自一个更大的示例中所示[如何： 使用的 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的图像列](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-work-with-image-columns-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。This code is part of a larger example shown in [How to: Work with Image Columns in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-work-with-image-columns-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ImageColumn_TicTacToe#10](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ImageColumn_TicTacToe/CPP/tictactoe.cpp#10)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ImageColumn_TicTacToe#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ImageColumn_TicTacToe/CS/tictactoe.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ImageColumn_TicTacToe#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ImageColumn_TicTacToe/VB/tictactoe.vb#10)]

span.span: DataGridView Control (Windows Forms)

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event CellContentClick As DataGridViewCellEventHandler

summary.span: 单击单元格的内容时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the content within a cell is clicked.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 单击单元格内容时发生此事件。This event occurs when the cell content is clicked. 它也会发生在用户按下并松开按钮单元格空格键或复选框单元格具有焦点，并且将发生两次以这些单元格类型，如果按空格键时，在单击单元格内容时。It also occurs when the user presses and releases the SPACEBAR while a button cell or check box cell has focus, and will occur twice for these cell types if the cell content is clicked while pressing the SPACEBAR. 使用此事件来检测的鼠标按钮点击或单击链接。Use this event to detect button clicks for a or link clicks for a . 在单击，此事件发生之前的复选框更改值，因此，如果不想计算基于当前值的预期值，通常将处理事件相反。For clicks in a , this event occurs before the check box changes value, so if you do not want to calculate the expected value based on the current value, you will typically handle the event instead. 因为发生了该事件的用户指定值时才提交，这通常会发生当焦点离开该单元格，则还必须处理事件。Because that event occurs only when the user-specified value is committed, which typically occurs when focus leaves the cell, you must also handle the event. 在该处理程序，如果当前单元格是一个复选框单元格，则调用方法并传入值。In that handler, if the current cell is a check box cell, call the method and pass in the value. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例提供确定单击的单元格是一个链接单元格或按钮单元格并作为结果执行相应操作此事件处理程序。The following code example provides a handler for this event that determines whether the clicked cell is a link cell or a button cell and performs the corresponding action as a result. 此示例摘自一个更大的示例中提供类概述主题。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview topic. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#60](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CPP/employees.cpp#60)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#60](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CS/employees.cs#60)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#60](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/VB/employees.vb#60)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解事件发生的并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑更换与或将消息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目名为`DataGridView1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `DataGridView1`. 然后，确保事件处理程序相关联事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. span.span: DataGridView Control (Windows Forms)

summary.span: 在需要单元格的快捷菜单时发生。

span.span: Occurs when a cell's shortcut menu is needed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件时才会发生时控制属性设置或其属性是`true`。The event occurs only when the control property is set or its property is `true`. 当处理指定处理程序中的快捷方式菜单显示事件，每当用户右键单击一个单元格。When you handle the event, the shortcut menu that you specify in the handler is shown whenever the user right-clicks a cell. 当你想要显示的当前状态或单元格的值的快捷菜单时，这很有用。This is useful when you want to display a shortcut menu determined by the current state or value of a cell. 时也会发生事件的值检索属性，或者以编程方式或当用户右键单击一个单元格。The event also occurs whenever the value of the property is retrieved, either programmatically or when the user right-clicks a cell. 可以使用并属性来确定的状态或值的单元格，并使用此信息来更改或修改属性。You can use the and properties to determine the state or value of a cell, and use this information to change or modify the property. 此属性使用的单元格的值初始化属性，该事件值重写属性。This property is initialized with the value of the cell property, which the event value overrides. 处理事件时使用的大量数据，以避免设置单元格的性能损失多个单元格的值。Handle the event when working with large amounts of data to avoid the performance penalties of setting the cell value for multiple cells. 有关详细信息，请参阅[缩放 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件的最佳做法](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). 您还可以指定快捷菜单，为各个行而不是通过设置行的各个单元格属性或处理事件。You can also specify shortcut menus for individual rows rather than individual cells by setting the row property or handling the event. 该单元格属性设置将覆盖该行属性设置，并事件替代这两事件和行属性设置。The cell property setting overrides the row property setting, and the event overrides both the event and the row property setting. 但是，您可以指定`null`为单元格的快捷菜单，以防止被覆盖的行的快捷菜单。However, you can specify `null` for a cell shortcut menu to prevent a row shortcut menu from being overridden. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用事件处理程序以显示当用户右键单击一个单元格时，使用自定义的快捷菜单。The following code example demonstrates how to use a event handler to display a custom shortcut menu used when the user right-clicks a cell. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView_SharedRowScenarios#20](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView_SharedRowScenarios/CPP/sharedrows.cpp#20)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView_SharedRowScenarios#20](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView_SharedRowScenarios/CS/sharedrows.cs#20)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView_SharedRowScenarios#20](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView_SharedRowScenarios/VB/sharedrows.vb#20)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event CellEndEdit As DataGridViewCellEventHandler

summary.span: 当前选定单元格的编辑模式停止时发生。

span.span: Occurs when edit mode stops for the currently selected cell.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了如何处理此事件，以便清除该行属性在以前由设置的情况下事件处理程序。The following code example illustrates how to handle this event to clear the row property in case it was previously set by a event handler. 事件处理程序可以清除错误文本，新单元格的值满足验证条件，但将恢复为旧的单元值的用户通过按 ESC，事件不会发生。The event handler can clear the error text when the new cell value meets the validation criteria, but when the user reverts to the old cell value by pressing ESC, the event does not occur. 此示例中提供一个更大示例摘自[演练： 验证 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的数据](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/walkthrough-validating-data-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。This example is part of a larger example available in [Walkthrough: Validating Data in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/walkthrough-validating-data-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataValidation#20](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataValidation/CS/datavalidation.cs#20)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataValidation#20](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataValidation/VB/datavalidation.vb#20)]

summary.span: 在 控件中的当前单元格更改或者该控件接收到输入焦点时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the current cell changes in the control or when the control receives input focus.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件可能会发生两次单击一下如果控件不具有输入的焦点并且单击的单元格以前不是当前单元格。This event may occur twice for a single click if the control does not have input focus and the clicked cell was not previously the current cell. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了如何处理此事件以更改当前单元格的属性。The following code example illustrates how to handle this event to change the property of the current cell. 在此示例选择背景色设置事件，然后重置为上事件。In this example the selection background color is set in the event, then reset to on the event. 若要运行此示例，请将代码粘贴到包含一个窗体名为`dataGridView1`，并确保所有事件都都具有其事件处理程序相关联。To run this example, paste the code into a form that contains a named `dataGridView1` and ensure that all events are associated with their event handlers. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc#190](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc/CS/datagridviewmisc.cs#190)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc#190](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc/VB/datagridviewmisc.vb#190)]

summary.span: 需要单元格的错误文本时发生。

span.span: Occurs when a cell's error text is needed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件时才会发生时控制属性设置或其属性是`true`。The event occurs only when the control property is set or its property is `true`. 处理事件非常有用，当你想要确定具体取决于其值或状态的单元格的错误。Handling the event is useful when you want to determine the error for a cell depending on its value or state. 当处理事件，并指定错误文本的处理程序中的单元格中显示错误标志符号除非属性设置为`false`或单元格处于编辑模式。When you handle the event and specify error text in the handler, an error glyph appears in the cell unless the property is set to `false` or the cell is in edit mode. 当用户将鼠标指针移到错误标志符号时，工具提示中将显示错误文本。When the user moves the mouse pointer over the error glyph, the error text appears in a ToolTip. 时也会发生事件的值检索属性。The event also occurs whenever the value of the property is retrieved. 可以使用并属性来确定的状态或值的单元格，然后使用此信息来更改或修改属性。You can use the and property to determine the state or value of a cell, and use this information to change or modify the property. 此属性使用的单元格的值初始化属性，该事件值重写属性。This property is initialized with the value of the cell property, which the event value overrides. 处理事件时使用的大量数据，以避免设置单元格的性能损失多个单元格的值。Handle the event when working with large amounts of data to avoid the performance penalties of setting the cell value for multiple cells. 有关详细信息，请参阅[缩放 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件的最佳做法](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建单元格的错误消息而无需共享行或导致要复制到共享的所有单元格的单元格错误。The following code example demonstrates how to create error messages for cells without unsharing rows or causing the cell error to be duplicated over all the shared cells. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView_SharedRowScenarios#20](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView_SharedRowScenarios/CPP/sharedrows.cpp#20)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView_SharedRowScenarios#20](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView_SharedRowScenarios/CS/sharedrows.cs#20)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView_SharedRowScenarios#20](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView_SharedRowScenarios/VB/sharedrows.vb#20)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event CellFormatting As DataGridViewCellFormattingEventHandler

summary.span: 需要设置单元格内容的显示格式时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the contents of a cell need to be formatted for display.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，控件将尝试将单元格的值转换为适合显示格式。By default, the control will attempt to convert a cell's value into a format suitable for display. 例如，它将转换为数字值的文本框单元中显示的字符串。For example, it will convert a numerical value into a string for display in a text box cell. 可以通过设置使用的格式设置约定来指示的属性属性返回如属性。You can indicate the formatting convention to use by setting the property of the returned by properties such as the property. 如果标准的格式设置是不够的可以自定义格式设置通过处理事件。If the standard formatting is insufficient, you can customize the formatting by handling the event. 此事件可以指示具体的显示值，以及单元格样式，如前景色和背景颜色，若要使用的单元格显示。This event lets you indicate the exact display value as well as the cell styles, such as background and foreground color, to use for the cell display. 这意味着可以处理任何类型的单元格格式，而不考虑是否单元格的值本身需要格式设置此事件。This means you can handle this event for any kind of cell formatting, regardless of whether the cell value itself needs formatting. 每次每个单元格绘制，因此，应避免耗时处理在处理此事件时发生的事件。The event occurs every time each cell is painted, so you should avoid lengthy processing when handling this event. 也会发生此事件时该单元格检索或其调用方法。This event also occurs when the cell is retrieved or its method is called. 当处理事件，与单元格的值初始化属性。When you handle the event, the property is initialized with the cell value. 如果提供从单元格的值的显示值的自定义转换，设置属性设置为转换后的值，确保新的值指定单元格的类型的属性。If you provide custom conversion from the cell value to the display value, set the property to the converted value, ensuring that the new value is of the type specified by the cell property. 若要指示没有更多值的格式设置是有必要，设置属性设置为`true`。To indicate that no further value formatting is necessary, set the property to `true`. 事件处理程序完成后，如果是`null`或者不是正确的类型，或属性是`false`，则使用格式化， ， ，和属性返回的单元格样式属性，则使用该单元格初始化属性。When the event handler completes, if the is `null` or is not of the correct type, or the property is `false`, the is formatted using the , , , and properties of the cell style returned by the property, which is initialized using the cell property. 而不考虑的值属性中，返回的对象的显示属性属性用于呈现该单元格。Regardless of the value of the property, the display properties of the object returned by the property are used to render the cell. 有关自定义格式设置使用的详细信息事件，请参阅[如何： 自定义 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的数据格式](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-customize-data-formatting-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about custom formatting using the event, see [How to: Customize Data Formatting in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-customize-data-formatting-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). 若要避免处理此事件时出现的性能损失，通过参数的事件处理程序，而不是直接访问该单元格访问该单元格。To avoid performance penalties when handling this event, access the cell through the parameters of the event handler rather than accessing the cell directly. 若要自定义一个带格式的用户指定值转换为实际的单元值，请处理事件。To customize the conversion of a formatted, user-specified value into an actual cell value, handle the event. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何处理事件。The following code example shows how to handle the event. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.GridViewUnbound#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.GridViewUnbound/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.GridViewUnbound#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.GridViewUnbound/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.GridViewUnbound#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.GridViewUnbound/VB/form1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event CellLeave As DataGridViewCellEventHandler

summary.span: 单元格失去输入焦点并且不再是当前单元格时发生。

span.span: Occurs when a cell loses input focus and is no longer the current cell.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了如何处理此事件以更改当前单元格的属性。The following code example illustrates how to handle this event to change the property of the current cell. 在此示例选择背景色设置事件，然后重置为上事件。In this example the selection background color is set in the event, then reset to on the event. 若要运行此示例，请将代码粘贴到包含一个窗体名为`dataGridView1`，并确保所有事件都都具有其事件处理程序相关联。To run this example, paste the code into a form that contains a named `dataGridView1` and ensure that all events are associated with their event handlers. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc#190](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc/CS/datagridviewmisc.cs#190)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc#190](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc/VB/datagridviewmisc.vb#190)]

span.span: DataGridView Control (Windows Forms)

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event CellMouseClick As DataGridViewCellMouseEventHandler

summary.span: 在用户用鼠标单击单元格中的任何位置时发生。

span.span: Occurs whenever the user clicks anywhere on a cell with the mouse.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当用户单击使用任意鼠标按钮时发生此事件。This event occurs when the user clicks using any of the mouse buttons. 使用属性来确定单击了哪个按钮。Use the property to determine which button was clicked. 若要检测是否单击的单元格，如按钮或单元格内的链接内容使用事件。To detect clicks on the contents of a cell, such as a button or link within a cell, use the event. 此事件处理程序接收的列索引和鼠标指针位置的行索引。The handler for this event receives the column index and row index of the mouse pointer position. 在单击，此事件发生之前的复选框更改值，因此，如果不想计算基于当前值的预期值，通常将处理事件相反。For clicks in a , this event occurs before the check box changes value, so if you do not want to calculate the expected value based on the current value, you will typically handle the event instead. 因为发生了该事件的用户指定值时才提交，这通常会发生当焦点离开该单元格，则还必须处理事件。Because that event occurs only when the user-specified value is committed, which typically occurs when focus leaves the cell, you must also handle the event. 在该处理程序，如果当前单元格是一个复选框单元格，则调用方法并传入值。In that handler, if the current cell is a check box cell, call the method and pass in the value. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解事件发生的并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑更换与或将消息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目名为`DataGridView1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `DataGridView1`. 然后，确保事件处理程序相关联事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#295](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#295)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#295](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#295)]

summary.span: 鼠标指针进入单元格时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the mouse pointer enters a cell.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示事件处理程序中使用图像列中的井字棋游戏实现控件。The following code example shows a event handler in a Tic-Tac-Toe game implementation that uses image columns in a control. 事件处理程序使用单元格的值来确定游标和要显示工具提示。The event handler uses the cell value to determine the cursor and ToolTip to display. 此代码摘自一个更大的示例中所示[如何： 使用的 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的图像列](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-work-with-image-columns-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。This code is part of a larger example shown in [How to: Work with Image Columns in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-work-with-image-columns-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). span.span: DataGridView Control (Windows Forms)

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event CellPainting As DataGridViewCellPaintingEventHandler

summary.span: 需要绘制单元格时发生。

span.span: Occurs when a cell needs to be drawn.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以处理此事件，以便自定义控件中单元格的外观。You can handle this event to customize the appearance of cells in the control. 您可以自己或绘制的单元格的特定部分绘制整个单元格并使用或方法来绘制其他部分。You can paint entire cells yourself, or paint specific parts of cells and use the or methods to paint other parts. 此外可以使用类来绘制使用当前主题的标准控件。You can also use the class to paint standard controls using the current theme. 有关详细信息，请参阅[以视觉样式呈现控件](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/rendering-controls-with-visual-styles.md)。For more information, see [Rendering Controls with Visual Styles](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/rendering-controls-with-visual-styles.md). 如果使用的[!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)]，还可以使用的标准映像的大型库具有访问控件。If you are using [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)], you also have access to a large library of standard images that you can use with the control. 在处理此事件时，您应通过事件处理程序的参数来访问该单元格，而不是直接访问该单元格。When handling this event, you should access the cell through the parameters of the event handler, rather than access the cell directly. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明了如何使用此事件来自定义特定列中的所有单元格的外观。The following code example illustrates how to use this event to customize the appearance of all cells in a particular column. 此代码是一个更大的示例中提供的一部分[如何： 自定义 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的单元外观](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/customize-the-appearance-of-cells-in-the-datagrid.md)。This code is part of a larger example available in [How to: Customize the Appearance of Cells in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/customize-the-appearance-of-cells-in-the-datagrid.md). [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellPainting#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellPainting/CS/form1.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellPainting#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellPainting/VB/form1.vb#10)]

span.span: How to: Customize the Appearance of Cells in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control
DataGridView Control (Windows Forms)

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event CellParsing As DataGridViewCellParsingEventHandler

summary.span: 在单元格值已修改的情况下，当单元格退出编辑模式时发生。

span.span: Occurs when a cell leaves edit mode if the cell value has been modified.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下控件将尝试将转换为实际的基础单元格值指定单元格的类型中的单元格中显示的一个用户指定值属性。By default, the control will attempt to convert a user-specified value displayed in a cell to an actual underlying cell value in the type specified by the cell property. 这种转换使用返回的单元格的单元格样式的格式设置属性属性。This conversion uses the formatting properties of the cell style returned by the cell property. 如果标准转换不满足你的需求，处理事件，以提供自定义值转换为所需的类型。If the standard conversion does not meet your needs, handle the event to provide custom value conversion to the required type. 用户可以进入编辑模式，使用指定的方法属性，来退出编辑模式下，在单元格中，提交任何更改，通过将移动到另一个单元或通过按 ENTER。Users can enter edit mode using the method specified by the property, and can leave edit mode, committing any changes to a cell, by moving to another cell or by pressing ENTER. 按 esc 键将恢复对值的任何更改之前已提交，和事件将会发生。Pressing ESC will revert any changes to the value before it is committed, and the event will not occur. 事件发生仅当单元格的值实际上已被修改，即使最终值是与原始值相同。The event occurs only if the cell value has actually been modified, even if the final value is the same as the original value. 它也会发生时调用方法。It also occurs when the method is called. 当处理事件，您可以将值转换自己也可以自定义默认转换。When you handle the event, you can convert the value yourself or you can customize the default conversion. 例如，您可以将值转换自己使用的单元格与所选的类型转换器方法。For example, you can convert the value yourself using the cell method with type converters of your choosing. 或者，可以让默认类型转换器分析的值，但需要修改， ，并返回的对象的属性属性，则使用该单元格初始化属性。Alternatively, you can let the default type converters parse the value, but modify the , , and properties of the object returned by the property, which is initialized using the cell property. 如果您自己转换值替换的初始的格式化值属性中指定单元格的类型转换后的值与属性。When you convert the value yourself, replace the initial, formatted value of the property with the converted value in the type specified by the cell property. 若要指示不做进一步分析是有必要，设置属性设置为`true`。To indicate that no further parsing is necessary, set the property to `true`. 事件处理程序完成后，如果是`null`或者不是正确的类型，或属性是`false`，则使用单元格分析与默认类型转换器方法。When the event handler completes, if the is `null` or is not of the correct type, or the property is `false`, the is parsed using the cell method with default type converters. 此方法的默认实现将分析值使用， ，和中传递的单元格样式属性。The default implementation of this method parses the value using the , , and properties of the cell style passed in. 如果值不等于，此值分析使用中传递的属性和类型转换器。If the value is not equal to , the value is parsed using the property and the type converters passed in. 若要自定义单元格的值转换为便于显示格式化值，请处理事件。To customize the conversion of a cell value into a formatted value for display, handle the event. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何处理事件。The following code example shows how to handle the event. 它还演示如何使用类。It also shows how to use the class. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.GridViewUnbound#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.GridViewUnbound/CPP/form1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.GridViewUnbound#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.GridViewUnbound/CS/form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.GridViewUnbound#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.GridViewUnbound/VB/form1.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event CellStyleChanged As DataGridViewCellEventHandler

summary.span: 在 的 属性更改时发生。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当任何一个时，将发生此事件的属性返回的属性设置为新值时，或者当属性设置为一个新具有至少一个属性值不同于上一个单元格样式对象。This event occurs when any property of the returned by a property is set to a new value or when a property is set to a new with at least one property value different than the previous cell style object. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解事件发生的并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑更换与或将消息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目名为`DataGridView1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `DataGridView1`. 然后，确保事件处理程序相关联事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件发生时的属性值对象返回的以下属性更改之一：The event occurs when a property value of a object returned by one of the following properties changes: - - - - - - - - 如果其中一个属性设置为另一种，但相应*PropertyName* `Changed`发生事件时，但事件不会发生。If one of these properties is set to a different , however, the corresponding *PropertyName*`Changed` event occurs, but the event does not occur. 有关行、 列和单元属性的名称*PropertyName* `Changed`事件开头"`Row`"、"`Column`"，或"`Cell`"(例如， )。For row, column, and cell properties, the name of the *PropertyName*`Changed` event begins with "`Row`", "`Column`", or "`Cell`" (for example, ). 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解事件发生的并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑更换与或将消息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目名为`DataGridView1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `DataGridView1`. 然后，确保事件处理程序相关联事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event.
