summary.span: 需要单元格的工具提示文本时发生。

span.span: Occurs when a cell's ToolTip text is needed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件时才会发生时控制属性设置或其属性是`true`。The event occurs only when the control property is set or its property is `true`. 当处理处理程序中指定的工具提示文本显示事件，每当鼠标指针位于单元格和控件属性值是`true`。When you handle the event, the ToolTip text you specify in the handler is shown whenever the mouse pointer is over a cell and the control property value is `true`. 事件非常有用，当你想要显示工具提示的当前状态或单元格的值。The event is useful when you want to display ToolTips determined by the current state or value of a cell. 时也会发生事件的值检索属性，或者以编程方式或当鼠标指针进入单元格。The event also occurs whenever the value of the property is retrieved, either programmatically or when the mouse pointer enters a cell. 可以使用并属性来确定的状态或值的单元格，并使用此信息来更改或修改属性。You can use the and properties to determine the state or value of a cell, and use this information to change or modify the property. 此属性使用的单元格的值初始化属性，该事件值重写属性。This property is initialized with the value of the cell property, which the event value overrides. 处理事件时使用的大量数据，以避免设置单元格的性能损失多个单元格的值。Handle the event when working with large amounts of data to avoid the performance penalties of setting the cell value for multiple cells. 有关详细信息，请参阅[缩放 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件的最佳做法](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用事件处理程序中绑定数据显示中隐藏的列信息控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use a event handler to display information from hidden columns in a data-bound control. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView_NeededEvents#20](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView_NeededEvents/CS/Form1.cs#20)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView_NeededEvents#20](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView_NeededEvents/VB/Form1.vb#20)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 处理此事件可用于验证之后处理的单元格的值。Handling this event is useful for post-validation processing of the cell value. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用事件来清除属性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the event to clear out the property. 在此示例中，事件将设置如果用户输入不是有效的单元格中的数据。In this example, the event sets the if the user enters data that is not valid into a cell. 此示例摘自一个更大的示例中提供事件。This example is part of a larger example available in the event. MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event CellValidating As DataGridViewCellValidatingEventHandler

summary.span: 在单元格失去输入焦点时发生，并启用内容验证功能。

span.span: Occurs when a cell loses input focus, enabling content validation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 取消此事件取消对当前单元格的更改。Canceling this event cancels the changes to the current cell. 取消此事件时在数据绑定模式下，新值未推送到基础数据源。When this event is canceled in data-bound mode, the new value is not pushed to the underlying data source. 当处于虚拟模式下，取消此事件不会引发事件。When this event is canceled in virtual mode, the event will not be raised. 处理事件来执行验证之后处理。Handle the event to perform post-validation processing. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例处理事件，以确保仅正整数由用户输入。The following code example handles the event to ensure that only positive integers are entered by the user. 此示例摘自一个更大的示例中提供参考主题。This example is part of a larger example available in the reference topic. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._Virtual#40](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._Virtual/CPP/virtual.cpp#40)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._Virtual#40](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._Virtual/CS/virtual.cs#40)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._Virtual#40](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._Virtual/VB/virtual.vb#40)]

summary.span: 单元格的值更改时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the value of a cell changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件发生时的用户指定的值是已提交，这通常发生在焦点离开单元格时。The event occurs when the user-specified value is committed, which typically occurs when focus leaves the cell. 对于复选框单元格，但是，您通常需要立即处理更改。In the case of check box cells, however, you will typically want to handle the change immediately. 若要提交更改，单击该单元格时，你必须处理事件。To commit the change when the cell is clicked, you must handle the event. 在处理程序中，如果当前单元格是一个复选框单元格，则调用方法并传入值。In the handler, if the current cell is a check box cell, call the method and pass in the value. 更改单元值时，控件中的行未自动排序。Rows in the control are not automatically sorted when a cell value is changed. 若要对控件进行排序时，用户修改一个单元格，调用中的方法事件处理程序。To sort the control when the user modifies a cell, call the method in a event handler. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用要更新的平衡列中的值的事件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the event to update the values in a balance column of a . 此示例摘自一个更大的示例中提供事件。This example is part of a larger example available in the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionSum#30](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionSum/CS/form1.cs#30)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionSum#30](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionSum/VB/form1.vb#30)]

span.span: Occurs when the property of the control is and the requires a value for a cell in order to format and display the cell.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 处于虚拟模式下使用此事件，而不会导致要成为非共享行的行填充单元格的自定义数据存储区中的数据。Use this event in virtual mode to populate cells with data from a custom data store without causing rows to become unshared. 有关行共享的详细信息，请参阅[缩放 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件的最佳做法](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about row sharing, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). 有关虚拟模式的详细信息，请参阅[Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的虚拟模式](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/virtual-mode-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about virtual mode, see [Virtual Mode in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/virtual-mode-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). 若要将用户指定的值添加到自定义数据存储，处理事件。To add user-specified values to your custom data store, handle the event. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例处理事件以填充单元格的正整数。The following code example handles the event to populate cells with positive integers. 此示例摘自一个更大的示例中提供参考主题。This example is part of a larger example available in the reference topic. span.span: Cancels the selection of all currently selected cells except the one indicated, optionally ensuring that the indicated cell is selected.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个`rowIndexException`值为-1 表示列标题，和一个`columnIndexException`值为-1 表示行标题。A `rowIndexException` value of -1 represents a column header, and a `columnIndexException` value of -1 represents a row header. 此方法可用于不取消选择单元格、 行或列异常索引所指示的情况下清除当前所选内容。This method is useful to clear the current selection without canceling the selection of the cell, row, or column indicated by the exception indexes. 如果属性值，则允许选择单个单元格，此方法设置属性为每个单元格`false`，不包括的行和指定列中单元格。If the property value allows individual cell selection, this method sets the property of each cell to `false`, excluding the cell in the row and column specified. 如果属性值的允许完整行或列的选择此方法还集属性的每个行或列到`false`、 排除列，其中包含指定的单元格的行。If the property value allows full row or column selection, this method also sets the property of each row or column to `false`, excluding the row or column containing the specified cell. 排除的单元格、 行或列可能会或可能未处于选定状态时调用此方法。The excluded cell, row, or column may or may not be in the selected state when this method is called. 此方法如果选取`selectExceptionElement`参数值是`true`。This method selects it if the `selectExceptionElement` parameter value is `true`. 根据选择模式的整行或列可能还选择结果。Depending on the selection mode, the entire row or column may also be selected as a result.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件将每个所选单元格的文本表示形式复制到剪贴板。The control copies the text representation of each selected cell to the Clipboard. 此值是转换为字符串，或对于图像单元格的值的单元格值属性。This value is the cell value converted to a string or, for image cells, the value of the property. 值复制到剪贴板中， ， ，和格式。Values are copied to the Clipboard in , , , and formats. 这些格式可用于将内容粘贴到记事本，Microsoft Excel 等应用程序和[!INCLUDE[ofprword](~/includes/ofprword-md.md)]。These formats are useful for pasting content into applications such as Notepad, Microsoft Excel, and [!INCLUDE[ofprword](~/includes/ofprword-md.md)]. 控制将复制包含所有选定的单元的最小矩形中包含的单元格。The control copies the cells contained in the smallest rectangle that includes all selected cells. 在复制的数据不表示不包含任何选定的单元格的行和列。Rows and columns that do not contain any selected cells are not represented in the copied data. 剩余的行和列中所有未选定单元格都是空白的占位符。Any unselected cells in the remaining rows and columns are represented by blank placeholders. 具体取决于复制模式和选择模式下，复制的行和列的标头值可能，还复制。Depending on the copy mode and the selection mode, header values for the copied rows and columns may be copied, as well. 当用户复制内容，控件将添加到剪贴板。When users copy content, the control adds a to the Clipboard. 此数据对象检索从方法。This data object is retrieved from the method. 当你想要以编程方式将数据对象添加到剪贴板时，可以调用此方法。You can call this method when you want to programmatically add the data object to the Clipboard. 方法检索每个单元格的值通过调用方法。The method retrieves values for individual cells by calling the method. 您可以覆盖一个或两个自定义的复制的单元格的布局或以支持其他数据格式的派生类中的这些方法。You can override either or both of these methods in derived classes to customize the layout of copied cells or to support additional data formats. 有关格式的剪贴板操作和数据格式的详细信息，请参阅类。For more information about Clipboard operations and data formats, see the class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何启用复制控件。The following code example demonstrates how to enable copying in the control. 此示例中提供一个更大示例摘自[如何： 启用用户添加到复制到剪贴板上从 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件的多个单元](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/enable-users-to-copy-multiple-cells-to-the-clipboard-datagridview.md)。This example is part of a larger example available in [How to: Enable Users to Copy Multiple Cells to the Clipboard from the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/enable-users-to-copy-multiple-cells-to-the-clipboard-datagridview.md). [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewClipboardDemo#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewClipboardDemo/CS/datagridviewclipboarddemo.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewClipboardDemo#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewClipboardDemo/VB/datagridviewclipboarddemo.vb#10)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置属性设为 0 将删除中的所有列。Setting the property to 0 will remove all columns from the . 如果重置为一个值小于当前值，列将不再从末尾集合。If is reset to a value less than the current value, columns will be removed from the end of the collection. 如果设置为大于当前值的值，列将添加到末尾集合。If is set to a value greater than the current value, columns will be added to the end of the collection. 此属性可用于属性来创建一个简单用于显示和编辑文本。This property can be used with the property to create a simple for displaying and editing text. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何设置， ， ， ， ， ， ， ， ，和属性。The following code example demonstrates how to set the , , , , , , , , , and properties. 此外，代码示例演示如何设置和属性。In addition, the code example demonstrates how to set the and properties. 若要运行此示例，请将代码粘贴到包含一个窗体名为`dataGridView1`，然后调用`SetUpDataGridView`方法从窗体的构造函数或事件处理程序。To run this example, paste the code into a form that contains a named `dataGridView1`, and then call the `SetUpDataGridView` method from the form's constructor or event handler. 请确保所有事件都都具有其事件处理程序相关联。Ensure all events are associated with their event handlers. summary.span: 用户双击两列之间的分隔符时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the user double-clicks a divider between two columns.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件可用于自定义当用户双击列分隔符时发生的自动调整大小行为。You can use this event to customize the automatic sizing behavior that occurs when a user double-clicks a column divider. 例如，您可以处理此事件来以编程方式仅根据当前可见的行中的内容的列的大小调整避免使用大量的行时的默认行为的性能影响。For example, you can handle this event to programmatically resize columns based only on the content in the rows that are currently visible, avoiding a performance impact with the default behavior when working with a large number of rows. 列属性不会扩展在其中用户可以双击的区域。The column property does not extend the area in which a user can double-click. 如果已通过使用此属性增加了分隔符的宽度，当用户双击分隔线与相邻的列之间的边界时，会发生此事件。If the width of a divider has been increased through the use of this property, this event occurs when the user double-clicks the boundary between the divider and the adjacent column. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解事件发生的并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑更换与或将消息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目名为`DataGridView1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `DataGridView1`. 然后，确保事件处理程序相关联事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 在中单击列标题时，默认行为是根据所单击的列，对网格行进行排序，或要反转排序顺序，如果网格已按所单击的列。When a column heading is clicked in a , the default behavior is to order the grid rows based on the clicked column, or to reverse the sort order if the grid is already sorted by the clicked column. 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此事件来执行模拟单击的默认行为的编程排序时禁用默认行为。The following code example demonstrates how to use this event to perform a programmatic sort that emulates the default behavior of clicking a when the default behavior has been disabled. 在此示例中，设置为，因此，单击选择的列的内容。In this example, the is set to , so clicking the selects the contents of the column. 对于能够按预期的示例代码，默认列标题中单击行为需要更改数据加载到每个时间。For the example code to function as intended, the default column header click behavior needs to be changed each time the data is loaded into the . 添加事件处理程序以提供更改默认行为的代码。Add a event handler to provide the code that changes the default behavior. 若要运行此示例，请将代码粘贴到包含一个窗体名为`dataGridView1`，并确保所有事件都都具有其事件处理程序相关联。To run this example, paste the code into a form that contains a named `dataGridView1` and ensure that all events are associated with their event handlers. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果属性设置为，则属性必须是一种系统颜色。If the property is set to anything other than , the property must be a system color. 不能将此属性设置为值，该值只读的值，指示使用自定义边框样式属性。You cannot set this property to the value, which is a read-only value indicating that the border style has been customized through the use of the property. > [!NOTE] > 如果通过应用程序启用了可视样式方法和属性是`true`，使用当前主题绘制列标题。If visual styles are enabled for the application through the method and the property is `true`, the column headers are painted using the current theme. 在本示例中的值除外的所有列标题会都忽略属性，到没有应用主题。In this case, the value of the property is ignored for all column headers except the , to which the theme is not applied. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何设置， ， ， ， ， ， ， ， ，和属性。The following code example demonstrates how to set the , , , , , , , , , and properties. 此外，代码示例演示如何设置和属性。In addition, the code example demonstrates how to set the and properties. 若要运行此示例，请将代码粘贴到包含一个窗体名为`dataGridView1`，然后调用`SetUpDataGridView`方法从窗体的构造函数或事件处理程序。To run this example, paste the code into a form that contains a named`dataGridView1`, and then call the `SetUpDataGridView` method from the form's constructor or event handler. 请确保所有事件都都具有其事件处理程序相关联。Ensure all events are associated with their event handlers. remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认值返回此属性具有以下初始属性值：The default returned by this property has the following initial property values: |`DataGridViewCellStyle` 属性`DataGridViewCellStyle` property|默认值Default value| |--------------------------------------|-------------------| || 属性的值。The value of the property.| || 属性的值。The value of the property.| || 属性的值。The value of the property.| || 属性的值。The value of the property.| || 属性的值。The value of the property.| ||| ||| 这些值会自动重写通过设置的值属性。These values automatically override the values set through the property. 若要强制继承的列标题值，您必须设置的值中为指定为默认值的对象类。To force column headers to inherit the values, you must set the values in the object to the default values indicated for the class. 有关单元格的样式继承的详细信息，请参阅[Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的单元格样式](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/cell-styles-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about cell style inheritance, see [Cell Styles in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/cell-styles-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). 如果启用了可视样式并设置为`true`，所有标头单元格除外使用当前主题绘制和值将被忽略。If visual styles are enabled and is set to `true`, all header cells except the are painted using the current theme and the values are ignored. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何设置， ， ， ， ， ， ， ， ，和属性。The following code example demonstrates how to set the , , , , , , , , , and properties. 此外，代码示例演示如何设置和属性。In addition, the code example demonstrates how to set the and properties. 若要运行此示例，请将代码粘贴到包含一个窗体名为`dataGridView1`，然后调用`SetUpDataGridView`方法从窗体的构造函数或事件处理程序。To run this example, paste the code into a form that contains a named `dataGridView1`, and then call the `SetUpDataGridView` method from the form's constructor or event handler. 请确保所有事件都都具有其事件处理程序相关联。Ensure all events are associated with their event handlers. summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否可以调整列标题的高度，以及它是由用户调整还是根据标题的内容自动调整。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the height of the column headers is adjustable and whether it can be adjusted by the user or is automatically adjusted to fit the contents of the headers.

value.span: 一个 值，指示可以在什么模式下调整列标题行的高度。

span.span: A value indicating the mode by which the height of the column headers row can be adjusted.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当此属性设置为，不能由用户调整列标题的高度。When this property is set to , the height of the column headers cannot be adjusted by the user. 若要以编程方式调整列标题的高度，请使用方法或一组属性。To adjust the height of the column headers programmatically, use the method or set the property. 若要设置行标题的大小调整模式，使用属性。To set the sizing mode for the row headers, use the property. 若要调整列标题换行为多行的单元格内容，必须具有的单元格样式属性值为。For cell contents to wrap onto multiple lines when the column headers are resized, the cell style in effect for the cell must have a property value of . 有关标头大小调整的详细信息，请参阅[Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中调整大小选项](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about header sizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). > [!NOTE] > 控件不支持双缓冲。The control does not support double buffering. 如果设置为`true`中派生控件，用户将不会收到可视反馈，或对列重新排序时调整行、 列或标头的大小。If is set to `true` in a derived control, users will not receive visual feedback when resizing rows, columns, or headers or when reordering columns. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了如何使用此属性在主要用于显示控件。The following code example illustrates how to use this property in a control intended primarily for display. 在此示例中，以下几种方式自定义控件的可视外观和控件配置为有限的交互。In this example, the visual appearance of the control is customized in several ways and the control is configured for limited interactivity. 此示例摘自一个更大的示例中提供类概述。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法尝试将用户指定的格式化值转换为基础的单元格的数据类型。This method attempts to convert the formatted, user-specified value to the underlying cell data type. 若要执行此操作，它会发出事件，可以处理自定义类型转换。To do this, it raises the event, which you can handle to customize the type conversion. 否则，将使用默认类型转换器。Otherwise, default type converters are used. 转换错误可能会导致异常，如果事件未处理以防止它。Conversion errors may result in an exception if the event is not handled to prevent it. 如果成功转换值，它将提交到数据存储，引发事件的非绑定到数据的单元格属性值是`true`。If the value is successfully converted, it is committed to the data store, raising the event for non-data-bound cells when the property value is `true`. 如果该值已成功提交事件发生。If the value is successfully committed, the event occurs. ## Examples 下面的代码示例调用方法内的要引发的事件处理程序事件。The following code example calls the method within a event handler to raise the event. 此代码示例摘自[如何： 禁用 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的按钮列中的按钮](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/disable-buttons-in-a-button-column-in-the-datagrid.md)。This code example is part of a larger example provided in [How to: Disable Buttons in a Button Column in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/disable-buttons-in-a-button-column-in-the-datagrid.md). summary.span: 获取或设置当前处于活动状态的单元格。

span.span: Gets or sets the currently active cell.

value.span: 表示当前单元格的 ，如果没有当前单元格，则为 。

span.span: The that represents the current cell, or if there is no current cell.

value.span: 默认值是第一列中的第一个单元格，如果控件中没有单元格，则为 。

span.span: The default is the first cell in the first column or if there are no cells in the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当将一个单元设置为当前的单元格时，它将显示在视图中，如果当前未显示。When you set a cell as the current cell, it will scroll into view if it is not currently displayed. 当前单元格不能为隐藏的行或列中的标头单元格、 已禁用的单元格或单元格。The current cell cannot be a header cell, a disabled cell, or a cell in a hidden row or column. 可以将此属性设置为`null`暂时删除聚焦框，但当该控件接收焦点和此属性的值是`null`，它会自动设置的值为属性。You can set this property to `null` to temporarily remove the focus rectangle, but when the control receives focus and the value of this property is `null`, it is automatically set to the value of the property. 当您更改此属性的值时事件之前发生事件。When you change the value of this property, the event occurs before the event. 任何事件处理程序访问属性在此时间将获得以前的值。Any event handler accessing the property at this time will get its previous value. 当绑定到外部数据源时，此属性将重置为其默认值。When you bind the to an external data source, this property is reset to its default value. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了如何确保通过设置排序后，当前单元格是可见通过检索到的单元格属性属性。The following code example illustrates how to ensure that the current cell is visible after sorting by setting the property to the cell retrieved through the property. 此代码仅适用于未绑定控件。This code works only with an unbound control. 使用控件绑定到外部数据源，当前单元格进行排序时不自动保存。With a control bound to an external data source, the current cell is not automatically persisted when sorting. 若要运行此示例，请将以下代码粘贴到包含一个窗体名为`dataGridView1`。To run this example, paste the following code into a form that contains a named `dataGridView1`. 在 C# 中，您必须连接事件的事件处理程序。In C#, you must also connect the event to the event handler. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc#150](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc/CS/datagridviewmisc.cs#150)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc#150](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc/VB/datagridviewmisc.vb#150)]

summary.span: 获取当前处于活动状态的单元格的行索引和列索引。

span.span: Gets the row and column indexes of the currently active cell.

value.span: 一个 ，表示当前处于活动状态的单元格的行索引和列索引。

span.span: A that represents the row and column indexes of the currently active cell.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此属性来确定行和当前单元格的列，而无需直接访问该单元格。Use this property to determine the row and column of the current cell without accessing the cell directly. 这可用于避免取消共享的行。This is useful to avoid unsharing shared rows. 有关行共享的详细信息，请参阅[缩放 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件的最佳做法](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about row sharing, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了如何使用行绘制方案中的属性。The following code example illustrates how to use the property in a row-painting scenario. 在示例中，此属性用于存储当前单元格的行索引。In the example, this property is used to store the row index of the current cell. 当用户更改当前单元格，为不同的行时，该行将强制重绘其自身。When the user changes the current cell to a different row, the row is forced to repaint itself. 此代码是一个更大的示例中提供的一部分[如何： 自定义 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的行外观](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/customize-the-appearance-of-rows-in-the-datagrid.md)。This code is part of a larger example available in [How to: Customize the Appearance of Rows in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/customize-the-appearance-of-rows-in-the-datagrid.md). [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPainting#19](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPainting/CS/datagridviewrowpainting.cs#19)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPainting#19](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPainting/VB/datagridviewrowpainting.vb#19)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 单元格被标记为已修改，如果其内容发生更改，但不是保存更改。A cell is marked as modified if its contents have changed but the change has not been saved. 当编辑单元格，但更改尚未提交到数据缓存，或取消编辑操作时通常发生此事件。This event typically occurs when a cell has been edited but the change has not been committed to the data cache, or when an edit operation is canceled. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何处理事件。The following code example demonstrates how to handle the event. 在此示例中，事件处理程序会调用方法来引发事件，并确定的当前值。In this example, the event handler calls the method to raise the event and determine the current value of a . 此代码示例摘自[如何： 禁用 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的按钮列中的按钮](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/disable-buttons-in-a-button-column-in-the-datagrid.md)。This code example is part of a larger example provided in [How to: Disable Buttons in a Button Column in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/disable-buttons-in-a-button-column-in-the-datagrid.md). remarks.format: ## Remarks 当源更改的数据内容或时，将引发此事件的值， ，或属性更改。This event is raised when the contents of the data source change or when the value of the , , or property changes. 处理此事件很有用，例如，若要以编程方式调整行和基于内容的更新的列的大小。Handling this event is useful, for example, to programmatically resize rows and columns based on content updates. 有关详细信息，请参阅[Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中调整大小选项](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此事件。The following code example illustrates the use of this event. 此示例摘自一个更大的示例中提供类概述。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView_NeededEvents#05](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView_NeededEvents/CS/Form1.cs#05)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView_NeededEvents#05](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView_NeededEvents/VB/Form1.vb#05)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event DataError As DataGridViewDataErrorEventHandler

summary.span: 在以下情况下发生：当外部数据分析或验证操作引发异常时，或者当尝试将数据提交到数据源失败时。

span.span: Occurs when an external data-parsing or validation operation throws an exception, or when an attempt to commit data to a data source fails.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件使你能够处理由控件调用数据处理操作期间的代码中引发的异常。The event enables you to handle exceptions thrown in code that is called by the control during data processing operations. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). > [!NOTE] > 并的属性通常与此事件关联的对象表示在其中发生数据错误的单元格。The and properties of the object associated with this event normally indicate the cell in which the data error occurred. 当错误发生在外部数据源时，但是，数据源可能无法提供发生错误的列。When the error occurs in an external data source, however, the data source may not provide the column in which the error occurred. 在这种情况下，属性通常在错误发生时表示当前单元格的列。In this case, the property typically indicates the column of the current cell at the time of the error. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了事件处理程序。The following code example demonstrates a event handler. 此示例摘自一个更大的示例中提供类概述主题。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview topic. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#50](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CPP/employees.cpp#50)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#50](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CS/employees.cs#50)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#50](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/VB/employees.vb#50)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 绑定到包含多个列表或表的数据源时，此属性很有用。This property is useful when binding to a data source that contains multiple lists or tables. 不需要绑定到包含一个列表或表的数据源时设置此属性。You do not need to set this property when binding to a data source that contains a single list or table. 例如，您可以将绑定控制对而无需设置此属性包含单个表。For example, you can bind a control to a that contains a single table without setting this property. 如果包含多个表，但是，必须设置此属性为一个表的名称。If the contains multiple tables, however, you must set this property to the name of one of the tables. ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明了此属性的一个常见用途。The following code example illustrates a common use for this property. 在示例中，名为控件`customersDataGridView`绑定到名为`customersDataSet`。In the example, a control named `customersDataGridView` is bound to a named `customersDataSet`. 这包含一个名为"客户"表。This contains a table named "Customers". 属性设置为的表的名称。The property is set to the name of the table. summary.span: 获取或设置 所显示数据的数据源。

span.span: Gets or sets the data source that the is displaying data for.

value.span: 包括要显示的 的数据的对象。

span.span: The object that contains data for the to display.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类支持标准 Windows 窗体数据绑定模型。The class supports the standard Windows Forms data-binding model. 这意味着数据源可以是任何类型的实现以下接口之一：This means the data source can be of any type that implements one of the following interfaces: - 界面，包括一维数组。The interface, including one-dimensional arrays. - 接口，如和类。The interface, such as the and classes. - 接口，如类。The interface, such as the class. - 接口，如类。The interface, such as the class. 有关具体示例，请参阅示例部分和在本部分末尾的任务表。For specific examples, see the Example section and the task table at the end of this section. 通常情况下，将绑定到组件和 bind组件到另一个数据源，或使用业务对象填充它。Typically, you will bind to a component and bind the component to another data source or populate it with business objects. 组件是首选的数据源，因为它可以绑定到各种数据源，并且可以自动解决许多数据绑定问题。The component is the preferred data source because it can bind to a wide variety of data sources and can resolve many data binding issues automatically. 在绑定到数据源包含多个列表或表，必须设置属性设置为一个字符串，指定该表要绑定到的列表。When binding to a data source that contains multiple lists or tables, you must set the property to a string that specifies the list or table to bind to. 绑定到时包含多个列表或表，但是的组件，可以设置属性的组件相反。When binding to a component that contains multiple lists or tables, however, you can set the property of the component instead. 在绑定到对象集合，而不数据库数据时，通常会设置属性返回的对象属性设置为`null`而不是使用的默认值，这是适用于数据库的数据。When binding to an object collection rather than to database data, you will typically set the property of the object returned by the property to `null` rather than using the default value of , which is appropriate for database data. 有关详细信息，请参阅[Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中显示数据](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/displaying-data-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information, see [Displaying Data in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/displaying-data-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). 下表提供了指向相关的常见任务的直接链接属性。The following table provides direct links to common tasks related to the property. 请参阅[演练： 创建母版/详细信息窗体使用两个 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/creating-a-master-detail-form-using-two-datagridviews.md)并[如何： 将对象绑定到 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-bind-objects-to-windows-forms-datagridview-controls.md)。See [Walkthrough: Creating a Master/Detail Form Using Two Windows Forms DataGridView Controls](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/creating-a-master-detail-form-using-two-datagridviews.md) and [How to: Bind Objects to Windows Forms DataGridView Controls](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-bind-objects-to-windows-forms-datagridview-controls.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何初始化简单数据绑定。The following code example demonstrates how to initialize a simple data-bound . 它还演示了如何设置属性。It also demonstrates how to set the property. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.GridViewSimpleBound#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.GridViewSimpleBound/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.GridViewSimpleBound#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.GridViewSimpleBound/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.GridViewSimpleBound#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.GridViewSimpleBound/VB/form1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 在未设置其他单元格样式属性的情况下，获取或设置应用于 中的单元格的默认单元格样式。

span.span: Gets or sets the default cell style to be applied to the cells in the if no other cell style properties are set.

value.span: 作为默认样式应用的 。

span.span: The to be applied as the default style.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件显示其使用指示单元格的样式的单元格属性，它继承自其他类型的属性的样式。The control displays its cells using the styles indicated by the cell property, which inherits styles from other properties of type . 通过指定的样式属性会影响除时重写通过以下属性指定的样式的所有单元格：The styles specified through the property affect all cells except when overridden by the styles specified through the following properties: - - - - - 有关详细信息，请参阅[Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的单元格样式](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/cell-styles-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information, see [Cell Styles in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/cell-styles-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). 获取此属性时如果属性尚未被访问，则将创建带有默认值。When getting this property, a with default values will be created if the property has not already been accessed. 获取此属性为多个行时，这会导致对性能产生影响。This can cause a performance impact when getting this property for many rows. 只要有可能，使用单个设置此属性的多个行。Whenever possible, use a single to set this property for multiple rows. 有关详细信息，请参阅[缩放 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件的最佳做法](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此属性在主要用于显示控件。The following code example illustrates the use of this property in a control intended primarily for display. 在此示例中，以下几种方式自定义控件的可视外观和控件配置为有限的交互。In this example, the visual appearance of the control is customized in several ways and the control is configured for limited interactivity. 此示例摘自一个更大的示例中提供类概述。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewStyleDemo#20](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewStyleDemo/CS/form1.cs#20)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewStyleDemo#20](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewStyleDemo/VB/form1.vb#20)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event DefaultValuesNeeded As DataGridViewRowEventHandler

summary.span: 用户输入新记录行以便可以使用默认值填充该行时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the user enters the row for new records so that it can be populated with default values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件可以填充新记录所对应的行，当用户输入行。This event lets you populate the row for new records when the user enters the row. 初始行值来自的属性每个列返回属性。Initial values for the row come from the property of the returned by each column's property. 在数据绑定模式下，所有单元格的数据绑定的列存储在外部数据源中的值。In data bound mode, all cell values for data bound columns are stored in the external data source. 当用户输入新记录行时，然后再在数据源中创建新行事件发生。When the user enters the row for new records, a new row is created in the data source before the event occurs. 当填充属性在事件处理程序中，可以直接向数据源中添加值。When you populate the property in your event handler, the values are added directly to the data source. 处于虚拟模式下，此事件之后，事件发生的每个单元中的新行，以便可以在自定义数据存储中存储的默认值。In virtual mode, after this event occurs, the event occurs for each cell in the new row so that you can store the default values in your custom data store. 然后，将事件发生在新行中，每个单元格中检索存储在值事件，然后显示该事件。Then, the event occurs for each cell in the new row, retrieving the values that you stored in the event, which are then displayed. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明了如何处理此事件。The following code example illustrates how this event can be handled. 在示例中，使用默认值填充单元格，给定的列。In the example, cells for the given columns are populated with default values. 有关`CustomerID`列中，值从另一个方法 （未实现） 会生成唯一的客户 id。For the `CustomerID` column, the value is retrieved from a separate method (not implemented) that generates a unique customer ID. 若要运行此示例中，将替换中实际的列对象的名称为列名称控制并提供适当的默认值。To run this example, replace the column names with the names of the column objects from an actual control and provide appropriate default values. 时按名称指定的列，必须使用的列对象并不列标题文本的名称。When specifying columns by name, you must use the name of the column object and not the column header text. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc#120](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc/CS/datagridviewmisc.cs#120)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc#120](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc/VB/datagridviewmisc.vb#120)]

public: virtual property System::Drawing::Rectangle DisplayRectangle { System::Drawing::Rectangle get(); };

summary.span: 获取表示控件的显示区域的矩形。

span.span: Gets the rectangle that represents the display area of the control.

value.span: 一个 ，它表示控件的显示区域。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性返回的控件，不包括显示任何滚动条占用的区域的显示区域的矩形工作区。The property returns the client rectangle of the display area of the control, not including the area occupied by any scroll bars that are showing.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果该单元格不在编辑模式下或单元格类型不适用于编辑控件，此属性返回`null`。If the cell is not in edit mode or the cell type does not accommodate an editing control, this property returns `null`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明了如何在自定义单元格类型的重写方法中使用此属性。The following code example illustrates how to use this property in an overridden method of a custom cell type. 在示例中，编辑控件的引用检索、 强制转换为自定义编辑的控件类型，并随后的单元格的当前值。In the example, a reference to the editing control is retrieved, cast to a custom editing control type, and then populated with the current value of the cell. 此示例中提供一个更大示例摘自[如何： 在 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 单元格中的宿主控件](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-host-controls-in-windows-forms-datagridview-cells.md)。This example is part of a larger example available in [How to: Host Controls in Windows Forms DataGridView Cells](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-host-controls-in-windows-forms-datagridview-cells.md). [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCalendarColumn#210](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCalendarColumn/CS/datagridviewcalendarcolumn.cs#210)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCalendarColumn#210](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCalendarColumn/VB/datagridviewcalendarcolumn.vb#210)]

span.span: DataGridView Control (Windows Forms)

summary.span: 显示用于编辑单元格的控件时发生。

span.span: Occurs when a control for editing a cell is showing.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以处理此事件时要执行的编辑控件的自定义初始化的单元格进入编辑模式。You can handle this event to perform custom initialization of the editing control when a cell enters edit mode. 若要自定义控件的显示特性，请设置返回的对象的属性属性。To customize the display characteristics of the control, set the properties of the object returned by the property. 若要执行其他初始化，将值强制转换的属性特定于控件类型和直接访问的成员。To perform other initialization, cast the value of the property to the specific control type and access the members directly. 例如，可以处理事件以将事件处理程序附加到编辑控件的事件。For example, you can handle the event to attach event-handlers to the events of the editing control. > [!NOTE] > 控制一次承载一个编辑控件和单元格类型之间的编辑不发生更改时重新使用编辑控件。The control hosts one editing control at a time, and reuses the editing control whenever the cell type does not change between edits. 将事件处理程序附加到编辑控件，因此必须采取预防措施以避免多次附加同一处理程序。When attaching event-handlers to the editing control, you must therefore take precautions to avoid attaching the same handler multiple times. 若要避免此问题，删除从之前的处理程序附加到该事件的事件处理程序。To avoid this problem, remove the handler from the event before you attach the handler to the event. 这将防止重复，如果处理程序已附加到该事件，但将不起任何作用。This will prevent duplication if the handler is already attached to the event, but will have no effect otherwise. 有关详细信息，请参阅中的示例代码类概述。For more information, see the example code in the class overview. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了如何处理此事件以更改当前单元格的属性。The following code example illustrates how to handle this event to change the property of the current cell. 若要运行此示例，请将代码粘贴到包含一个窗体名为`dataGridView1`并确保事件是与事件处理程序相关联。To run this example, paste the code into a form that contains a named `dataGridView1` and ensure that the event is associated with the event handler. value.span: 默认为 属性的值。

span.span: The default is the value of the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性是一个环境属性。The property is an ambient property. 环境属性是控件属性，如果未设置，检索从父控件。An ambient property is a control property that, if not set, is retrieved from the parent control. 例如，具有相同作为其父默认情况下。For example, a will have the same as its parent by default. 有关环境属性的详细信息，请参阅类或类概述。For more information about ambient properties, see the class or the class overview. 因为是不可变的 （这意味着您不能调整其任何属性），您可以只分配属性指定新对象。Because the is immutable (meaning that you cannot adjust any of its properties), you can only assign the property a new object. 但是，您可以基于现有字体中的新字体。However, you can base the new font on the existing font. 控件使用的值属性的默认值作为的属性返回的对象， ，和属性。The control uses the value of the property as the default value of the properties of objects returned by the , , and properties. 更改值会自动更新， ，和属性，更改任何继承值的单元的字体。Changing the value automatically updates the , , and properties, changing the font for any cell that inherits the value. 默认情况下，标头单元格重写的值，并且可重写特定行、 列和单元格的值。Header cells override the value by default, and you can override the value for specific rows, columns, and cells. 有关单元格的样式继承的详细信息，请参阅[Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的单元格样式](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/cell-styles-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about cell style inheritance, see [Cell Styles in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/cell-styles-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此属性。The following code example illustrates the use of this property. 此示例中提供一个更大示例摘自[如何： 创建未绑定 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-create-an-unbound-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。This example is part of a larger example available in [How to: Create an Unbound Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-create-an-unbound-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法检索表示选定单元格定义的区域的数据。This method retrieves data that represents the region defined by the selected cells. 此区域是包含所有选定单元格的最小矩形。This region is the smallest rectangle that includes all of the selected cells. 在此区域中每个所选单元格的值通过调用检索方法。The value for each selected cell in this region is retrieved by calling the method. 在此区域未选定单元格采用空白的占位符值。Blank placeholder values are used for unselected cells in this region. 此方法将这些值合并到包含几种格式复制到剪贴板。This method combines these values into a containing several formats for copying to the clipboard. 受支持的剪贴板格式包括， ， ，和。The supported clipboard formats include , , , and . 有关更多信息，请参见 类。For more information, see the class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以编程方式添加所选到剪贴板的内容。The following code example demonstrates how to programmatically add selected content to the Clipboard. 此示例中提供一个更大示例摘自[如何： 启用用户添加到复制到剪贴板上从 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件的多个单元](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/enable-users-to-copy-multiple-cells-to-the-clipboard-datagridview.md)。This example is part of a larger example available in [How to: Enable Users to Copy Multiple Cells to the Clipboard from the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/enable-users-to-copy-multiple-cells-to-the-clipboard-datagridview.md). remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法可用于强制进行的条件下，可能不会导致进行重新绘制的单元格的单元格重画。This method is useful to force a cell repaint in conditions that would not normally cause a cell to be repainted. 例如，您可以更改其外观发生外部事件的自定义单元格类型使用此方法。For example, you can use this method with a custom cell type that changes its appearance as a result of external events. 有关绘制和无效的详细信息，请参阅。For more information about painting and invalidation, see . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了如何在自定义中使用此方法当鼠标指针停留在其上时为绘制自定义的边框。The following code example illustrates how to use this method in a customized that is painted with a custom border when the mouse pointer rests on it. 在示例中，该单元格在鼠标指针进入或离开它时将会失效。In the example, the cell is invalidated when the mouse pointer enters or leaves it. 此代码是一个更大的示例中提供的一部分[如何： 自定义单元格和列的扩展及其行为和外观在 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/customize-cells-and-columns-in-the-datagrid-by-extending-behavior.md)。This code is part of a larger example available in [How to: Customize Cells and Columns in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control by Extending Their Behavior and Appearance](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/customize-cells-and-columns-in-the-datagrid-by-extending-behavior.md). remarks.format: ## Remarks 当未绑定到数据，该单元格编辑被视为已提交时用户移到另一个单元格。When the is not bound to data, the cell edit is considered committed when the user moves to another cell. 如果行标题可见，铅笔标志符号中不存在标头以包含具有未提交的更改的单元格的行。If row headers are visible, a pencil glyph is present in the header for the row that contains a cell with uncommitted changes. 如果是`true`和当前单元格承载的编辑控件，可以检索通过属性。If is `true` and the current cell hosts an editing control, you can retrieve it through the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用属性可确定是否要提交一个单元格值并引发事件处理程序从事件。The following code example uses the property to determine whether to commit a cell value and raise the event from a handler for the event. 此代码示例摘自[如何： 禁用 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的按钮列中的按钮](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/disable-buttons-in-a-button-column-in-the-datagrid.md)。This code example is part of a larger example provided in [How to: Disable Buttons in a Button Column in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/disable-buttons-in-a-button-column-in-the-datagrid.md). remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性返回`true`铅笔标志符号的行中的显示时。This property returns `true` when the pencil glyph is displayed in the row. 默认情况下属性始终等于的值属性，除非绑定到数据源，支持编辑或虚拟模式下是否实现使用行级提交作用域。By default, the property will always equal the value of the property, unless the is bound to a data source that supports editing, or virtual mode has been implemented to use row-level commit scope. 在这些情况下，将评估此属性在行级。In these cases, the will evaluate this property at the row level. 当用户导航离开行时，该控件提交行的所有更改。When the user navigates away from the row, the control commits all row changes. 用户还可以按 CTRL + ENTER 无需离开行提交的行更改。The user can also press CTRL+ENTER to commit row changes without leaving the row. 若要以编程方式提交的行更改，请调用窗体的方法。To commit row changes programmatically, call the form's method. 如果数据源，你还可以调用。If your data source is a , you can also call .

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否允许用户一次选择 的多个单元格、行或列。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the user is allowed to select more than one cell, row, or column of the at a time.

value.span: 如果用户一次可以选择多个单元格、行或列，为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the user can select more than one cell, row, or column at a time; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当属性设置为`true`，可以在选择多个元素 （单元格、 行或列）控件。When the property is set to `true`, multiple elements (cells, rows, or columns) can be selected in the control. 若要选择多个元素，用户可以按住 CTRL 键同时单击要选择的元素。To select multiple elements, the user can hold down the CTRL key while clicking the elements to select. 通过单击选择的第一个元素，然后在按住 SHIFT 键，单击要选择的最后一个元素的同时，可以选择连续元素。Consecutive elements can be selected by clicking the first element to select and then, while holding down the SHIFT key, clicking the last element to select. 选择作用域基于属性。The selection scope is based on the property. 例如，如果设置为，用户可以选择多个列。For example, if is set to , the user can select multiple columns. 可以使用属性，以允许用户选择多个元素中的控件并对所有所选的元素执行操作。You can use the property to allow a user to select multiple elements in the control and perform an operation on all the selected elements. 例如，用户可以选择多个单元格，然后右键单击选定的单元格以显示快捷菜单，显示一组要在选定单元格上执行的任务。For example, the user could select multiple cells and then right-click a selected cell to display a shortcut menu that displays a set of tasks to perform on the selected cells. 若要确定哪个单元格、 行或列中选择控件，您可以访问， ，或属性。To determine which cells, rows, or columns are selected in the control, you can access the , , or property. 若要确定所选单元格的数目，请调用方法的参数值替换。To determine the number of selected cells, call the method with an argument value of . 使用方法来检索所选的行数和方法来检索其中的列数。Use the method to retrieve the number of selected rows and the method to retrieve the number of columns. 这些方法是比直接访问集合，使用大量的数据时更有效。These methods are more efficient than accessing the collections directly when working with large amounts of data. 有关详细信息，请参阅[缩放 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件的最佳做法](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property. 若要运行此示例，请将代码粘贴到包含一个窗体名为`dataGridView1`，然后调用`SetUpDataGridView`方法从窗体的构造函数或事件处理程序。To run this example, paste the code into a form that contains a named `dataGridView1`, and then call the `SetUpDataGridView` method from the form's constructor or event handler. 请确保所有事件都都具有其事件处理程序相关联。Ensure all events are associated with their event handlers. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.GridViewUnbound#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.GridViewUnbound/CPP/form1.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.GridViewUnbound#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.GridViewUnbound/CS/form1.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.GridViewUnbound#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.GridViewUnbound/VB/form1.vb#5)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解事件发生的并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑更换与或将消息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目名为`DataGridView1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `DataGridView1`. 然后，确保事件处理程序相关联事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#273](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#273)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#273](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#273)]

span.span: Occurs when the property of the is and the user navigates to the new row at the bottom of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当是处于虚拟模式下，此事件，以便在新行中，在数据存储区中创建一个新条目，而且它还允许使用默认值填充的行。When the is in virtual mode, this event allows a new entry to be created in the data store for the new row, and it also allows for the row to be populated with default values. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用事件来跟踪添加新行，那么在中的，逻辑时事件处理程序可以将其初始化为初始值的新行的单元格。The following code example uses the event to track when a new row is being added, so logic in the event handler can initialize a new row's cell to an initial value. 此示例摘自一个更大的示例中提供参考主题。This example is part of a larger example available in the reference topic. remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用此方法以允许自定义单元格类型，以通知模型中的未提交的更改。This method can be used to allow custom cell types to notify the when they have uncommitted changes. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此方法在自定义单元格方案中。The following code example illustrates the use of this method in a custom cell scenario. 在示例中，实现派生自类重写方法，并使用方法，以指示更改控件。In the example, an implementation derived from the class overrides the method and uses the method to indicate a change to the control. 此示例摘自一个更大的示例中所示[如何： 在 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 单元格中的宿主控件](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-host-controls-in-windows-forms-datagridview-cells.md)。This example is part of a larger example shown in [How to: Host Controls in Windows Forms DataGridView Cells](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-host-controls-in-windows-forms-datagridview-cells.md). summary.span: 引发 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 在派生类中重写 时，一定要调用基类的 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常情况下，双击单元格在编辑模式下将单元格。Typically, double-clicking a cell puts the cell in edit mode. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `clipBounds`参数表示的区域，需要重新绘制。The `clipBounds` parameter represents the area of the that needs to be repainted. 例如，如果用户覆盖了整个用另一个窗口，然后将其暴露，然后`clipBounds`表示整个。For example, if a user covers the entire with another window and then uncovers it, then `clipBounds` represents the entire . 如果用户覆盖较小的区域，然后将其暴露，然后`clipBounds`表示所涉及的小块区域。If a user covers a small area of the and then uncovers it, then `clipBounds` represents the small area that was covered.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法调用密钥处理方法适用于按下的键 (例如，方法时按 F2)，并返回该方法的返回值。This method calls the key-processing method appropriate to the key pressed (for example, the method when F2 is pressed) and returns the return value of that method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何更改在 ENTER 键的行为通过重写子类和方法。The following code example demonstrates how to change the behavior of the ENTER key in a subclass by overriding the and methods. 在示例中，ENTER 键具有相同的行为作为向右箭头键，方便用户无法编辑数据的单一行的多个单元格。In the example, the ENTER key has the same behavior as the RIGHT ARROW key, making it easier for a user to edit multiple cells in a single row of data. summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示用户是否可以编辑 控件的单元格。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 单元格是只读的如果的值属性是`true`单元格、 单元格的行、 单元格的列，或。A cell is read-only if the value of the property is `true` for the cell, the cell's row, the cell's column, or the . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此属性在主要用于显示控件。The following code example illustrates the use of this property in a control intended primarily for display. 在此示例中，以下几种方式自定义控件的可视外观和控件配置为有限的交互。In this example, the visual appearance of the control is customized in several ways and the control is configured for limited interactivity. 此示例摘自一个更大的示例中提供类概述。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewStyleDemo#20](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewStyleDemo/CS/form1.cs#20)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewStyleDemo#20](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewStyleDemo/VB/form1.vb#20)]

exception.span: 设置此属性时指定的值为 ，当前单元格处于编辑模式，并且当前单元格包含无法提交的更改。

span.span: The specified value when setting this property is , the current cell is in edit mode, and the current cell contains changes that cannot be committed.

exception.span: 当设置此属性时，指定的值将导致控件进入编辑模式，但是对正在编辑的单元格值的初始化失败，并且 事件没有处理程序，或者处理程序已将 属性设置为 。

span.span: The specified value when setting this property would cause the control to enter edit mode, but initialization of the editing cell value failed and either there is no handler for the event or the handler has set the property to .

summary.span: 当 属性更改时发生。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解事件发生的并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑更换与或将消息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目名为`DataGridView1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `DataGridView1`. 然后，确保事件处理程序相关联事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#274](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#274)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#274](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#274)]

summary.span: 当前单元格在处于编辑模式时，用基础单元格的值刷新当前单元格的值会丢弃以前的任何值。

span.span: Refreshes the value of the current cell with the underlying cell value when the cell is in edit mode, discarding any previous value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此方法来强制进行更新其显示值在编辑模式下的单元格。Call this method to force a cell to update its display value in edit mode. 当外部进程修改单元格的值，而且你想要通知用户的更改，即使结果会丢失用户指定的更改，这很有用。This is useful when an external process modifies the cell value and you want to notify the user of the change, even when a user-specified change is lost as a result.

summary.span: 在需要行的快捷菜单时发生。

span.span: Occurs when a row's shortcut menu is needed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件时才会发生时控制属性设置或其属性是`true`。The event occurs only when the control property is set or its property is `true`. 处理事件非常有用，当你想要显示的行的当前状态或它包含的值的快捷菜单。Handling the event is useful when you want to display a shortcut menu determined by a row's current state or the values it contains. 当处理处理程序中指定的快捷方式菜单显示事件，每当用户右键单击某一行除非重写已单击的特定单元格的快捷菜单。When you handle the event, the shortcut menu that you specify in the handler is shown whenever the user right-clicks a row unless the overrides the shortcut menu for the specific cell that was clicked. 时也会发生事件的值检索属性，或者以编程方式或当用户右键单击某一行。The event also occurs whenever the value of the property is retrieved, either programmatically or when the user right-clicks a row. 可以使用属性来确定它所包含的值或行的状态并使用此信息来更改或修改属性。You can use the property to determine the state of a row or the values it contains, and use this information to change or modify the property. 此属性使用的行的值初始化属性，该事件值重写属性。This property is initialized with the value of the row property, which the event value overrides. 处理事件时使用的大量数据，以避免设置行的性能损失的多个行的值。Handle the event when working with large amounts of data to avoid the performance penalties of setting the row value for multiple rows. 有关详细信息，请参阅[缩放 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件的最佳做法](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例中处理事件，以便提供基于员工的标题。The following code example handles the event to provide a based on the title of the employee. 在此示例中，有两个快捷菜单，一个用于管理人员，一个用于所有其他员工。In this example, there are two shortcut menus, one for managers and one for all other employees. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView_NeededEvents#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView_NeededEvents/CS/Form1.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView_NeededEvents#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView_NeededEvents/VB/Form1.vb#10)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果设置为一个值小于当前值，将从中删除行从末尾集合。If is set to a value less than the current value, rows will be removed from the end of the collection. 如果设置为大于当前值的值，行将添加到末尾集合。If is set to a value greater than the current value, rows will be added to the end of the collection. 其他行基于中指定的行属性。The additional rows are based on the row specified in the property. 如果您设置属性设为 0，将从删除所有行。If you set the property to 0, all rows will be removed from the . 这相当于调用方法。This is equivalent to calling the method. > [!NOTE] > 如果是`true`，不能设置为 0。If is `true`, you cannot set to 0. 在这种情况下，调用方法来移除新记录的行之外的所有行。In this case, call the method to remove all rows except the row for new records. 调用具有相同的结果设置为 1 时在此情况下，但不要快得多。Calling has the same result as setting to 1 in this case, but is much faster. 属性可以用于属性来创建一个简单用于显示和编辑文本。The property can be used with the property to create a simple for displaying and editing text. 如果您设置属性的值大于 0 的控件不包含列，自动添加。If you set the property to a value greater than 0 for a control without columns, a is added automatically. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将属性。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property. 在此示例中，此属性用于跟踪中的条目数。In this example, this property is used to track the number of entries in a . 此示例摘自一个更大的示例中提供事件。This example is part of a larger example available in the event. summary.span: 在以下情况下发生：当 控件的 属性为 ，并且 需要确定当前行是否有未提交的更改时。

span.span: Occurs when the property of the control is and the needs to determine whether the current row has uncommitted changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，此事件将设置属性设置为`true`如果当前行中的任何单元格已被修改。By default, this event sets the property to `true` if any cells in the current row have been modified. 这将导致事件发生时用户将恢复对行进行编辑。This causes the event to occur when the user reverts edits to a row. 用户可以两次时单元格在编辑模式下或在非编辑模式，按 esc 键还原对行进行编辑。Users can revert edits to a row by pressing ESC twice when a cell is in edit mode or once outside of edit mode. 此事件可用于通过设置自定义处于虚拟模式下提交范围为正确的值，具体取决于所选的提交作用域的属性。This event can be used for customizing commit scope in virtual mode by setting the property to the correct value depending on the chosen commit scope. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何处理此事件可提供单元格级提交作用域，这意味着用户可以还原到当前单元格的更改。The following code example demonstrates how to handle this event to provide cell-level commit scope, meaning that the user can revert changes to the current cell only. 在单元格级提交范围内，该行才被视为具有未提交更改时，才当前单元格有未提交的更改，而不是时行中的任何单元格有未提交的更改。In cell-level commit scope, the row is treated as having uncommitted changes only when the current cell has uncommitted changes, rather than when any cell in the row has uncommitted changes. 此示例中提供一个更大示例摘自[演练： 在 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中实现虚拟模式](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/implementing-virtual-mode-wf-datagridview-control.md)。This example is part of a larger example available in [Walkthrough: Implementing Virtual Mode in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/implementing-virtual-mode-wf-datagridview-control.md). [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode#160](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode/CPP/virtualmode.cpp#160)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode#160](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode/CS/virtualmode.cs#160)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode#160](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode/VB/virtualmode.vb#160)]

span.span: Occurs when the user double-clicks the divider between two rows.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件可用于自定义当用户双击行分隔符时发生的自动调整大小行为。You can use this event to customize the automatic sizing behavior that occurs when a user double-clicks a row divider. 行属性不会扩展在其中用户可以双击的区域。The row property does not extend the area in which a user can double-click. 如果已通过使用此属性增加了分隔符的高度，当用户双击分隔线与相邻的列之间的边界，会发生此事件。If the height of a divider has been increased through the use of this property, this event occurs when the user double-clicks the boundary between the divider and the adjacent column. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解事件发生的并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑更换与或将消息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目名为`DataGridView1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `DataGridView1`. 然后，确保事件处理程序相关联事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件发生时最初加载时，以及当用户选择当前行以外的行。This event occurs when the is initially loaded, as well as when the user selects a row other than the current row. 此事件之前发生更新属性。This event occurs before the property is updated. 若要检索新输入行的索引，请使用事件处理程序中的属性。To retrieve the index of the newly-entered row, use the property within the event handler. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了如何处理此事件以更改的当前行中单元格的属性。The following code example illustrates how to handle this event to change the property of the cells in the current row. 在此示例中中, 设置的背景色事件，然后重置为上事件。In this example, the background color is set in the event, then reset to on the event. 若要运行此示例，请将代码粘贴到包含一个窗体名为`dataGridView1`，并确保所有事件都都具有其事件处理程序相关联。To run this example, paste the code into a form that contains a named `dataGridView1`, and ensure that all events are associated with their event handlers. remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件时才会发生时的属性控件设置或其属性是`true`。The event occurs only when the property of the control is set or its property is `true`. 处理事件非常有用，当你想要确定具体取决于其状态以及它包含的值的行的错误。Handling the event is useful when you want to determine the error for a row depending on its state and the values it contains. 当处理事件和错误文本中指定处理程序中，行标题中显示错误标志符号除非属性设置为`false`。When you handle the event and specify error text in the handler, an error glyph appears in the row header unless the property is set to `false`. 当用户将鼠标指针移到错误标志符号时，工具提示中将显示错误文本。When the user moves the mouse pointer over the error glyph, the error text appears in a ToolTip. 时也会发生事件的值检索属性。The event also occurs whenever the value of the property is retrieved. 可以使用属性来确定它所包含的值或行的状态并使用此信息来更改或修改属性。You can use the property to determine the state of a row or the values it contains, and use this information to change or modify the property. 此属性使用的行的值初始化属性，该事件值重写属性。This property is initialized with the value of the row property, which the event value overrides. 处理事件时使用的大量数据，以避免设置行的性能损失的多个行的值。Handle the event when working with large amounts of data to avoid the performance penalties of setting the row value for multiple rows. 有关详细信息，请参阅[缩放 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件的最佳做法](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否可以调整行标题的宽度，以及它是由用户调整还是根据标题的内容自动调整。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the width of the row headers is adjustable and whether it can be adjusted by the user or is automatically adjusted to fit the contents of the headers.

value.span: 一个 值，指示可以在什么模式下调整行标题的宽度。

span.span: A value indicating the mode by which the width of the row headers can be adjusted.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当此属性设置为自动调整大小模式时，则不能由用户调整行标题的宽度。When this property is set to an automatic sizing mode, the width of the row headers cannot be adjusted by the user. 若要以编程方式调整行标题的高度，请使用方法或一组属性。To adjust the height of the row headers programmatically, use the method or set the property. 若要设置列标题的大小调整模式，使用属性。To set the sizing mode for the column headers, use the property. 有关标头大小调整的详细信息，请参阅[Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中调整大小选项](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about header sizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). > [!NOTE] > 控件不支持双缓冲。The control does not support double buffering. 如果设置为`true`中派生控件，用户将不会收到可视反馈，或对列重新排序时调整行、 列或标头的大小。If is set to `true` in a derived control, users will not receive visual feedback when resizing rows, columns, or headers or when reordering columns. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了如何使用此属性在主要用于显示控件。The following code example illustrates how to use this property in a control intended primarily for display. 在此示例中，以下几种方式自定义控件的可视外观和控件配置为有限的交互。In this example, the visual appearance of the control is customized in several ways and the control is configured for limited interactivity. 此示例摘自一个更大的示例中提供类概述。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPainting#40](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPainting/CS/datagridviewrowpainting.cs#40)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPainting#40](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPainting/VB/datagridviewrowpainting.vb#40)]

span.span: DataGridView Control (Windows Forms)

summary.span: 请求有关行高度的信息时发生。

span.span: Occurs when information about row height is requested.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件可用于在排序操作之后保留自定义行的高度。This event is useful for preserving custom row heights after a sorting operation. 这是必需的因为排序操作通常由数据源，这不会不跟踪的数据行和控件中的行之间的对应关系。This is necessary because sorting operations are normally handled by the data source, which does not keep track of the correspondence between rows of data and rows in the control. 此事件时才会发生时已设置属性时，或者当属性是`true`。This event occurs only when the property has been set or when the property is `true`. 在后一种情况下，提供你自己的数据存储和排序操作。In the latter case, you provide your own data store and sorting operations. 处理事件，以存储更新后的高度的信息，当用户更改行高度。Handle the event to store updated height information when the user changes a row height. 使用时要检索存储的高度信息的控件需要它。Use to retrieve the stored height information when the control needs it. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解事件发生的并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑更换与或将消息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目名为`DataGridView1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `DataGridView1`. 然后，确保事件处理程序相关联事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#351](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#351)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#351](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#351)]

span.span: DataGridView Control (Windows Forms)

summary.span: 用户更改行高度时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the user changes the height of a row.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发此事件时属性设置为`true`或属性设置为值`null`。This event is raised when the property is set to `true` or the property is set to a value other than `null`. 使用此事件来跟踪和存储，以便它可以还原在排序操作之后的行的高度信息。This event is used to track and store row height information so that it can be restored after a sorting operation. 若要还原高度信息，请处理事件。To restore height information, handle the event. 请注意，仅当用户更改行的高度时，才会发生此事件。Note that this event occurs only when the user changes the height of a row. 如果以编程方式更改行的高度，必须存储在同一时间的新高度信息。If you change the height of a row programmatically, you must store the new height information at the same time. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解事件发生的并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑更换与或将消息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目名为`DataGridView1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `DataGridView1`. 然后，确保事件处理程序相关联事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#352](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#352)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#352](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#352)]
