span.span: DataGridView Control (Windows Forms)

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event RowPostPaint As DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventHandler

summary.span: 在绘制 后发生。

span.span: Occurs after a is painted.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 单独或组合使用可以处理此事件事件，以自定义控件中的行的外观。You can handle this event alone or in combination with the event to customize the appearance of rows in the control. 您可以自己或绘制的行的特定部分绘制整个行，并使用以下方法的类来绘制其他部分：You can paint entire rows yourself, or paint specific parts of rows and use the following methods of the class to paint other parts: - - - - - 此外可以使用类来绘制使用当前主题的标准控件。You can also use the class to paint standard controls using the current theme. 有关详细信息，请参阅[以视觉样式呈现控件](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/rendering-controls-with-visual-styles.md)。For more information, see [Rendering Controls with Visual Styles](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/rendering-controls-with-visual-styles.md). 如果使用的[!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)]，还可以使用的标准映像的大型库具有访问控件。If you are using [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)], you also have access to a large library of standard images that you can use with the control. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用的处理程序事件以绘制跨越下方正常的单元格的值的整个行的文本内容。The following code example demonstrates how to use a handler for the event to paint textual content that spans the entire row below the normal cell values. 此示例中提供一个更大示例摘自[如何： 自定义 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的行外观](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/customize-the-appearance-of-rows-in-the-datagrid.md)。This example is part of a larger example available in [How to: Customize the Appearance of Rows in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/customize-the-appearance-of-rows-in-the-datagrid.md). [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPainting#30](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPainting/CS/datagridviewrowpainting.cs#30)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPainting#30](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPainting/VB/datagridviewrowpainting.vb#30)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 单独或组合使用可以处理此事件事件，以自定义控件中的行的外观。You can handle this event alone or in combination with the event to customize the appearance of rows in the control. 您可以自己或绘制的行的特定部分绘制整个行，并使用以下方法的类来绘制其他部分：You can paint entire rows yourself, or paint specific parts of rows and use the following methods of the class to paint other parts: - - - - - 此外可以使用类来绘制使用当前主题的标准控件。You can also use the class to paint standard controls using the current theme. 有关详细信息，请参阅[以视觉样式呈现控件](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/rendering-controls-with-visual-styles.md)。For more information, see [Rendering Controls with Visual Styles](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/rendering-controls-with-visual-styles.md). 如果使用的[!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)]，还可以使用的标准映像的大型库具有访问控件。If you are using [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)], you also have access to a large library of standard images that you can use with the control. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用的处理程序事件以绘制渐变行背景，如果选择的行。The following code example demonstrates how to use a handler for the event to paint a gradient row background if the row is selected. 此示例中提供一个更大示例摘自[如何： 自定义 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的行外观](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/customize-the-appearance-of-rows-in-the-datagrid.md)。This example is part of a larger example available in [How to: Customize the Appearance of Rows in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/customize-the-appearance-of-rows-in-the-datagrid.md). [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPainting#20](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPainting/CS/datagridviewrowpainting.cs#20)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPainting#20](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPainting/VB/datagridviewrowpainting.vb#20)]

span.span: DataGridView Control (Windows Forms)

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Rows As DataGridViewRowCollection

summary.span: 获取一个集合，该集合包含 控件中的所有行。

span.span: Gets a collection that contains all the rows in the control.

value.span: 一个 ，包含 控件中的所有行。

span.span: A that contains all the rows in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用集合来手动填充控件而不是绑定到数据源。You can use the collection to manually populate a control instead of binding it to a data source. 下面的示例演示了如何手动添加和插入行。The following example shows you how to manually add and insert rows. 此示例假定你已添加了四个到控件的实例集合。This example assumes that you have added four instances to the control's collection. ```vb Me.dataGridView1.Rows.Add("five", "six", "seven", "eight") Me.dataGridView1.Rows.Insert(0, "one", "two", "three", "four") ``` ```csharp this.dataGridView1.Rows.Add("five", "six", "seven", "eight");this.dataGridView1.Rows.Insert(0, "one", "two", "three", "four"); ``` 有关以编程方式填充未绑定的详细示例控件，请参阅示例部分。For a detailed example that programmatically populates an unbound control, see the Example section. 行包含除了单元格的值的样式信息。Rows include style information in addition to cell values. 出于此原因，你可能想要添加或插入基于已经设置样式的现有行的行。For this reason, you might want to add or insert rows based on existing rows that you have already styled. 你可以使用， ， ，和方法。You can do this using the , , , and methods. 此外可以使用集合来修改控件中的值，或若要删除的行。You can also use the collection to modify the values in the control or to remove rows. 您可以修改的值或删除而不考虑是否将控件绑定到外部数据源的行。You can modify values or remove rows regardless of whether the control is bound to an external data source. 如果数据源，所做的更改是对直接数据源。If there is a data source, the changes are made directly to the data source. 您可能仍需要将数据源更新推送到远程数据库，但是。You may still need to push the data source updates to a remote database, however. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何： 将数据绑定到 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-bind-data-to-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information, see [How to: Bind Data to the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-bind-data-to-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). 下面的示例演示如何以编程方式修改单元格的值。The following example shows you how to modify cell values programmatically. ```vb ' Modify the value in the first cell of the second row. Me.dataGridView1.Rows[1].Cells[0].Value = "new value" ' The previous line is equivalent to the following line. Me.dataGridView1[0, 1].Value = "new value" ``` ```csharp // Modify the value in the first cell of the second row. this.dataGridView1.Rows[1].Cells[0].Value = "new value"; // The previous line is equivalent to the following line. this.dataGridView1[0, 1].Value = "new value"; ``` 除了标准的集合功能，你可以使用集合来检索行的相关信息。In addition to the standard collection capabilities, you can use the collection to retrieve information about rows. 使用方法来确定特定行的状态。Use the method to determine the state of a particular row. 使用和方法来确定的行数或行中某一特定状态的组合的高度。Use the and methods to determine the number of rows or the combined height of rows in a particular state. 若要检索具有特定状态的行的索引，请使用， ， ，和方法。To retrieve the index of a row with a particular state, use the , , , and methods. 下面的示例演示如何检索第一个的所选行的索引，并使用它以编程方式删除该行。The following example shows you how to retrieve the index of the first selected row, and then use it to programmatically delete the row. ```vb Dim rowToDelete As Int32 = Me.dataGridView1.Rows.GetFirstRow( _ DataGridViewElementStates.Selected) If rowToDelete > -1 Then Me.dataGridView1.Rows.RemoveAt(rowToDelete) End If ``` ```csharp Int32 rowToDelete = this.dataGridView1.Rows.GetFirstRow( DataGridViewElementStates.Selected); if (rowToDelete > -1) { this.dataGridView1.Rows.RemoveAt(rowToDelete); } ``` 若要提高性能，返回的属性可以包含共享和非共享行。To improve performance, the returned by the property can include shared and unshared rows. 共享的行共享的内存来减少大型记录集的成本。Shared rows share memory to reduce the cost of a large record set. 如果将记录集非常大，您应该小心地保证行共享尽可能多地访问时属性。If your record set is very large, you should be careful to keep the rows shared as much as possible when accessing the property. 有关详细信息，请参阅[缩放 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件的最佳做法](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建未绑定; set ， ，和属性，并使用和属性。The following code example demonstrates how to create an unbound ; set the , , and properties; and use the and properties. 它还演示了如何使用新版和方法正确调整列标题和行的大小。It also demonstrates how to use a version of the and methods to properly size the column headers and the rows. 若要运行此示例，请将以下代码粘贴到包含一个窗体名为`dataGridView1`和名为的按钮`Button1`，然后调用`InitializeDataGridView`方法从窗体的构造函数或事件处理程序。To run this example, paste the following code into a form that contains a named `dataGridView1` and a button named `Button1`, and then call the `InitializeDataGridView` method from the form's constructor or event handler. 请确保所有事件已都连接到其事件处理程序。Ensure all events are connected with their event handlers. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.GridViewAutoSize#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.GridViewAutoSize/CPP/form1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.GridViewAutoSize#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.GridViewAutoSize/CS/form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.GridViewAutoSize#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.GridViewAutoSize/VB/form1.vb#2)]

span.span: DataGridView Control (Windows Forms)

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event RowsAdded As DataGridViewRowsAddedEventHandler

summary.span: 在向 中添加新行之后发生。

span.span: Occurs after a new row is added to the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 添加新行时，控件中的行未自动排序。Rows in the control are not automatically sorted when new rows are added. 若要对新的行进行排序为正确的位置，调用中的方法事件处理程序。To sort new rows into their correct position, call the method in a event handler. 当用户添加新行，对于新记录，请使用行值的处理程序中此事件是等于新记录所在行的新位置的索引这是一个大于刚刚添加的行。When the user adds a new row using the row for new records, the value in the handler for this event is equal to the index of the new location of the row for new records, which is one greater than the row just added. 添加新行时以编程方式，但是，值是添加的第一行的索引。When you add rows programmatically, however, the value is the index of the first row added. 处于虚拟模式下，此事件发生之前事件可用于在您然后，您可以填充中的数据存储区中创建新记录和事件处理程序。In virtual mode, this event occurs before the event and can be used to create new records in your data store that you can then populate in the event handler. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例中处理事件来增加虚拟机中的行号。The following code example handles the event to increment the number of rows in a virtual . 在中使用的行数处理程序，以便它知道何时显示空白单元格与初始化单元格的新行。The number of rows is used in the handler so it knows when to show a blank cell versus an initialized cell for a new row. 此示例摘自一个更大的示例中提供参考主题。This example is part of a larger example available in the reference topic. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._Virtual#20](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._Virtual/CPP/virtual.cpp#20)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._Virtual#20](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._Virtual/CS/virtual.cs#20)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._Virtual#20](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._Virtual/VB/virtual.vb#20)]

span.span: DataGridView Control (Windows Forms)

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Forms::DataGridViewCellStyle ^ RowsDefaultCellStyle { System::Windows::Forms::DataGridViewCellStyle ^ get(); void set(System::Windows::Forms::DataGridViewCellStyle ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置应用于 的行单元格的默认样式。

span.span: Gets or sets the default style applied to the row cells of the .

value.span: 要应用于 的行单元格的 。

span.span: The to apply to the row cells of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件显示其使用指示单元格的样式的单元格属性，它继承自其他类型的属性的样式。The control displays its cells using the styles indicated by the cell property, which inherits styles from other properties of type . 对于所有行中的单元格，不包括标头单元格，通过指定的样式属性重写通过指定的样式和属性，并通过指定的样式重写， ，和属性。For cells in all rows, excluding header cells, the styles specified through the property override the styles specified through the and properties, and are overridden by the styles specified through the , , and properties. 有关详细信息，请参阅[Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的单元格样式](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/cell-styles-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information, see [Cell Styles in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/cell-styles-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). 获取此属性时如果属性尚未被访问，则将创建带有默认值。When getting this property, a with default values will be created if the property has not already been accessed. 获取此属性为多个行时，这会导致对性能产生影响。This can cause a performance impact when getting this property for many rows. 只要有可能，使用单个设置此属性的多个行。Whenever possible, use a single to set this property for multiple rows. 有关详细信息，请参阅[缩放 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件的最佳做法](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了如何使用此属性来创建在分类帐效果控件。The following code example illustrates how to use this property to create a ledger effect in a control. 此示例摘自一个更大的示例中提供类概述。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview. summary.span: 获取或设置一行，该行表示控件中所有行的模板。

span.span: Gets or sets the row that represents the template for all the rows in the control.

value.span: 表示行模板的 。

span.span: A representing the row template.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有时您希望更好地控制的外观所提供的各种内容的行单元格样式属性。Sometimes you want greater control over the appearance of rows than what is provided by the various cell style properties. 属性，可以创建和初始化用作模板的所有行，包括用于新记录的行 （如果是`true`。The property lets you create and initialize a for use as a template by all rows, including the row for new records if is `true`. 在设置属性，如行高度的默认值时，这是非常有用。This is useful when you are setting default values for properties such as row height. 例如，你可能想要增加默认行的高度，以显示跨多个列的内容提供下方普通单元格内容的额外空间。For example, you may want to increase the default row height in order to provide extra room beneath ordinary cell content for displaying content that spans multiple columns. 在使用自定义派生自的类型显示外部数据时，才需要设置行模板类。Setting the row template is necessary when external data is displayed using custom types derived from the class. 对于未绑定控件，可以以编程方式填充与自定义行类型的实例的集合。With unbound controls, you can programmatically populate the collection with instances of your custom row type. 显示外部数据时，但是，行自动生成的但基于行模板，可以设置为自定义行类型的实例。When displaying external data, however, the rows are generated automatically, but they are based on the row template, which you can set to an instance of your custom row type. 如果尚未设置此属性检索其值，第一次新创建并返回。If this property has not been set the first time you retrieve its value, a new is created and returned. ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明了如何使用行模板指定的初始行高度和最小行高。The following code example illustrates how to use the row template to specify an initial row height and a minimum row height. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowTemplate#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowTemplate/CPP/datagridviewrowtemplate.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowTemplate#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowTemplate/CS/datagridviewrowtemplate.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowTemplate#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowTemplate/VB/datagridviewrowtemplate.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件是类似于事件。This event is analogous to the event. 使用此事件的行的所有值进行验证。Use this event to perform validation on all the values of a row. 如果该行未通过验证，则设置属性设置为`true`。If the row does not pass validation, set the property to `true`. 取消此事件可防止， ，和事件的发生，还可以防止用户离开无效的行并防止行保存到外部数据源中数据绑定模式。Canceling this event prevents the , , and events from occurring, and also prevents the user from leaving the invalid row and prevents the row from being saved to an external data source in data bound mode. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用以检查是否输入了有效的跟踪和发布日期。The following code example uses to check if valid track and release dates are entered. remarks.format: ## Remarks 当为列选择模式，此方法调用时，每个列属性设置为`true`，和每个行属性设置为`false`。When the is in column-selection mode and this method is called, each column's property is set to `true`, and each row's property is set to `false`. 相反，当是行选择模式，此方法调用时，每一行属性设置为`true`，而每一列属性设置为`false`。Conversely, when the is in row-selection mode and this method is called, each row's property is set to `true`, and each column's property is set to `false`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将方法。The following code example demonstrates the use of the method. 若要运行此示例，请将代码粘贴到包含一个窗体名为`dataGridView1`和一个名为`selectAllButton`，并确保所有事件都都具有其事件处理程序相关联。To run this example, paste the code into a form that contains a named `dataGridView1` and a named `selectAllButton`, and ensure all events are associated with their event handlers. remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性始终填充而不考虑属性值。The property is always populated regardless of the property value. 此属性包含在引用它时所选内容的只读快照。This property contains a read-only snapshot of the selection at the time it is referenced. 如果保存到此集合的副本上，它可能不同于实际后续在其中用户可能已更改所选内容的状态。If you hold onto a copy of this collection, it may differ from the actual, subsequent state in which the user may have changed the selection. 因此，应不运行集合的副本。Therefore, you should not operate on a copy of the collection. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用集合以找到所选内容中的值的总和。The following code example demonstrates how to use the collection to find the sum of the values in the selection. 在示例中，此集合并通过循环访问和有效的值添加到总和，用于在标签中显示。In the example, this collection is iterated through and the valid values are added to the sum, which is displayed in a label. 此示例摘自一个更大的示例中提供事件。This example is part of a larger example available in the event. remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性必须设置为或为属性要使用填充选定的行。The property must be set to or for the property to be populated with selected rows. 此属性包含在引用它时所选内容的只读快照。This property contains a read-only snapshot of the selection at the time it is referenced. 如果保存到此集合的副本上，它可能不同于实际后续在其中用户可能已更改所选内容的状态。If you hold onto a copy of this collection, it may differ from the actual, subsequent state in which the user may have changed the selection. 您应因此不执行操作的集合的副本。You should therefore not operate on a copy of the collection. 若要以编程方式选择某一行，将设置其属性设置为`true`。To programmatically select a row, set its property to `true`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用中的属性事件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property in the event. 在此示例中，如果第一行包含在集合中，则删除操作已取消。In this example, if the first row is contained in the collection, then the deletion is canceled. 此示例摘自一个更大的示例中提供事件。This example is part of a larger example available in the event. remarks.format: ## Remarks 选定单元或取消所选内容，是否通过编程方式或用户执行任何操作时，将发生此事件。This event occurs whenever cells are selected or the selection is canceled, whether programmatically or by user action. 例如，此事件非常有用，当你想显示当前所选单元之和。For example, this event is useful when you want display the sum of the currently selected cells. 当更改的值属性，事件之前发生事件。When you change the value of the property, the event occurs before the event. 任何事件处理程序访问属性在此时间将获得以前的值。Any event handler accessing the property at this time will get its previous value. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将此事件。The following code example demonstrates the use of this event. 在示例中，窗体中选定的单元格显示值的总和，所选内容更改时，更新之和。In the example, the form displays the sum of values in the selected cells, and updates the sum when the selection changes. remarks.format: ## Remarks 当此属性的值是`true`和鼠标指针位于单元格上，该单元格显示的工具提示时满足以下条件之一：When the value of this property is `true` and the mouse pointer is over a cell, the cell displays a ToolTip when one of the following conditions is met: - 值属性不是`null`或的值属性是`true`，和的处理程序事件集属性的值以外的其他。The value of the property is not `null` or the value of the property is `true`, and a handler for the event sets the property to a value other than . - 单元格的属性的值而不。The property of the cell has a value other than . 当没有设置此属性产生任何影响事件处理程序由于自动获取属性的值引发事件，并返回工具提示文本指定在事件处理程序。Setting this property has no effect when there is a event handler because getting the value of the property automatically raises the event and returns the ToolTip text specified in the event handler. - 单元格的值是在单元格显示被截断。The cell value is truncated in the cell display. 当单元格的值属性值是，截断的单元格的值的完整值显示在工具提示中。When the value of the cell property value is , the full value of the truncated cell value is displayed in the ToolTip.

span.span: if the editing glyph is visible; otherwise, .

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 行标题将显示当前单元格处于编辑模式和用户具有对该单元格的更改时看起来像铅笔编辑标志符号。The row header will display an editing glyph that looks like a pencil when the current cell is in edit mode and the user has made changes to the cell. 编辑标志符号使用行标头单元格的属性。The editing glyph is colored by using the property of the row header cell. 如果空间不足，无法完全显示，则不会呈现标志符号。The glyph is not rendered if there is not enough space to display it completely. 例如，如果行标头单元格具有其属性集，该标志符号集删除如果没有足够的空间用于文本和字形。For example, if the row header cell has its property set, the glyph is removed if there is not enough room for both the text and glyph. 显示编辑标志符号的值由控制处于虚拟模式下的属性。The display of the editing glyph is controlled by the value of the property in virtual mode. 否则，由控制属性。Otherwise, it is controlled by the property. 未向公共公开标准字形。The standard glyph is not publicly exposed. 若要自定义标志符号，可以创建自定义类。To customize the glyph, you can create a custom class.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示行标题是否为包含数据输入错误的每一行显示错误标志符号。

value.span: 如果 指示有错误，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the indicates there is an error; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指示是否在行中单元格之一时出错。The property indicates if there is an error in one of the cells in a row. 如果设置为一个值，而不，然后为错误标志符号 (![ErrorProvider 图标](~/add/media/vberrorprovidericon.gif "ErrorProvider 图标")) 显示在行标题中。If is set to a value other than , then an error glyph (![ErrorProvider icon](~/add/media/vberrorprovidericon.gif "ErrorProvider icon")) is shown in the row header. 行标题的默认宽度包括足够的空间来显示错误标志符号，指示显示标志符号。The default width of the row header includes enough room to display the error glyph, whether or not the glyph is displayed. 如果行标题的大小进行调整，以便没有足够的空间来完全显示标志符号，则不会呈现标志符号。If the row header size is adjusted so that there is not enough space to display the glyph completely, the glyph is not rendered. 行标题可以显示文本和字形，因为标头内容显示按优先级别，按如下所示：Because row headers can display both text and glyphs, header content is displayed by priority, as follows: 1. 中的行标题单元格显示的文本。Text displayed in the row header cell. 2. 编辑标志符号。The editing glyph. 3. 错误标志符号。The error glyph. 例如，如果行宽减小，错误标志符号将消失第一次，然后标准符号，则文本。For example, if the row width is decreased, the error glyph disappears first, then the standard glyph, then text. 高级的用户可以通过开发自定义自定义错误标志符号或类。Advanced users can customize the error glyph by developing a custom or class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法允许排序功能的高级自定义类。This method allows advanced customization of the sorting feature of the class. 为了实现高度自定义排序操作，您可以编写事件处理程序事件和调用此方法的实现的类实例作为参数的接口。In order to implement a highly customized sorting operation, you can write an event handler for the event and call this method with an instance of a class that implements the interface as a parameter. 在这种情况下，通常会设置属性设置为若要禁用自动排序，并留出空间排序标志符号。In this case, you will typically set the property to to disable automatic sorting and to leave room for a sorting glyph. 排序时按列设置为以编程方式排序模式，您必须显示排序标志符号自己通过设置属性。When sorting by columns set to programmatic sort mode, you must display the sorting glyph yourself by setting the property. 此方法时才起作用未设置属性。This method works only when the property is not set. 当绑定控件到外部数据源时，必须使用该数据源提供的排序操作。When you bind the control to an external data source, you must use the sorting operations provided by that data source. 当你通过实现虚拟模式下提供您自己的数据源时，您还必须处理排序操作自己。When you provide your own data source by implementing virtual mode, you must also handle the sorting operations yourself. 调用此方法会自动设置属性设置为`null`。Calling this method automatically sets the property to `null`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用在多个列排序方案中的方法重载。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method overload in a multiple column sort scenario. 在此示例中，接口实现中`RowComparer`类。In this example, the interface is implemented in the `RowComparer` class. summary.span: 基于指定列的内容，按升序或降序对 控件的内容进行排序。

span.span: Sorts the contents of the control in ascending or descending order based on the contents of the specified column.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法的内容进行排序进行对比来指定列中的值。This method sorts the contents of the by comparing values in the specified column. 默认情况下，将使用排序操作方法来比较对列使用中的单元格属性。By default, the sort operation will use the method to compare pairs of cells in the column using the property. 对于具有的列属性设置为，则和属性自动设置，则显示相应的排序标志符号。For columns with the property set to , the and properties are set automatically and the appropriate sorting glyph is displayed. 对于具有的列属性设置为，必须通过自己显示排序标志符号属性。For columns with the property set to , you must display the sorting glyph yourself through the property. 你可以自定义排序操作使用此方法通过处理事件。You can customize the sorting operation used by this method by handling the event. 此事件时才会发生时未设置属性。This event occurs only when the property has not been set. 当属性已设置，此方法适用于仅限数据绑定列。When the property has been set, this method works for data-bound columns only. 数据绑定列有其属性集。Data-bound columns have had their property set. 这将导致属性以返回`true`。This causes the property to return `true`. 如果你控件包含绑定和未绑定列，则必须实现虚拟模式时对控件进行排序的绑定列保持未绑定列的值。If your control contains both bound and unbound columns, you must implement virtual mode to maintain the values of the unbound columns when the control is sorted by a bound column. 您可以执行此操作通过设置属性设置为`true`和处理事件。You can do this by setting the property to `true` and handling the event. 如果列是可编辑，还应处理事件。If the column is editable, you should also handle the event. 有关虚拟模式的详细信息，请参阅[如何： 在 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中实现虚拟模式](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-implement-virtual-mode-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about virtual mode, see [How to: Implement Virtual Mode in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-implement-virtual-mode-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). 不支持数据绑定控件时由未绑定的列进行排序。Sorting by unbound columns when the control is data-bound is not supported. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用中以编程方式排序。The following code example demonstrates how to use the in a programmatic sort. summary.span: 在 对两个单元格的值进行比较以执行排序操作时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the compares two cell values to perform a sort operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件时才会发生时未设置属性和属性值是`false`。This event occurs only when the property is not set and the property value is `false`. 此事件将对正在排序的列中的单元格进行比较。This event compares pairs of cells in the column being sorted. 仅当用户单击的列的标头时，才发生属性值为，或当您调用重载。It occurs only when the user clicks the header of a column with a property value of , or when you call the overload. 当发生此事件时具有的列属性值为，必须通过自己显示排序标志符号属性。When this event occurs for a column with a property value of , you must display the sorting glyph yourself through the property. 可以使用此事件在一列或多个列中使用单元格的值的行进行排序。You can use this event to sort rows using the cell values in one column or in multiple columns. 使用并属性中指定的列中的单元格值进行比较属性。Use the and properties to compare cell values in the column specified in the property. 使用并访问通过其他列中的值的属性集合。Use the and properties to access values in other columns through the collection. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用中多个列进行排序。The following code example demonstrates how to use the in a multiple column sort. 此示例摘自[如何： 自定义 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的排序](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-customize-sorting-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。This example is part of a larger example provided in [How to: Customize Sorting in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-customize-sorting-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件不会发生时属性设置为`true`控件按未绑定的列。This event does not occur when the property is set to `true` and the control is sorted by an unbound column. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明了如何确保排序后的当前单元格将可见。The following code example illustrates how to ensure that the current cell is visible after sorting. 此代码仅适用于未绑定控件。This code works only with an unbound control. 使用控件绑定到外部数据源，当前单元格进行排序时不自动保存。With a control bound to an external data source, the current cell is not automatically persisted when sorting. 若要运行此示例，请将以下代码粘贴到包含一个窗体名为`dataGridView1`。To run this example, paste the following code into a form that contains a named `dataGridView1`. 在 C# 中，您必须连接事件的事件处理程序。In C#, you must also connect the event to the event handler. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc#150](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc/CS/datagridviewmisc.cs#150)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc#150](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc/VB/datagridviewmisc.vb#150)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果未排序，则此属性将返回`null`。If the is not sorted, this property will return `null`. 当此属性指示的列具有属性值为，它将显示排序标志符号值的基础属性。When the column indicated by this property has a property value of , it will display a sorting glyph based on the value of the property. 当列为属性值为，必须通过自己显示排序标志符号属性。When the column has a property value of , you must display the sorting glyph yourself through the property. > [!NOTE] > 当您对使用自定义排序的控件进行排序时，此属性的值没有意义。The value of this property is not meaningful when you sort the control using custom sorting. 有关自定义排序的详细信息，请参阅方法和事件。For more information about custom sorting, see the method and the event. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用中以编程方式排序的属性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property in a programmatic sort. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此属性来确定由指定的列显示哪些排序标志符号属性具有属性值为。This property is used to determine which sorting glyph appears when the column specified by the property has a property value of . 当列为属性值为，必须显示并自行通过隐藏排序标志符号属性。When the column has a property value of , you must display and hide the sorting glyph yourself through the property. 当列为属性值为，可以显示排序标志符号，但如果自动调整列的大小不为其保留空间。When the column has a property value of , you can display the sorting glyph, but space is not reserved for it if the column is automatically resized. > [!NOTE] > 当您对使用自定义排序的控件进行排序时，此属性的值没有意义。The value of this property is not meaningful when you sort the control using custom sorting. 有关自定义排序的详细信息，请参阅方法和事件。For more information about custom sorting, see the method and the event. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用中以编程方式排序的属性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property in a programmatic sort. summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示按 Tab 键是否会将焦点按 Tab 键顺序移到下一个控件，而不是将焦点移到控件中的下一个单元格。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the TAB key moves the focus to the next control in the tab order rather than moving focus to the next cell in the control.

value.span: 如果按 Tab 键会将焦点按 Tab 键顺序移到下一个控件，为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the TAB key moves the focus to the next control in the tab order; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性设置为`false`允许使用 TAB 键移动焦点的单元格组成的网格中。Setting this property to `false` allows the TAB key to move the focus through the grid of cells. 下表描述了单元格焦点时按下的给定选项卡组合的更改。The following table describes how the cell focus changes when the given TAB key combinations are pressed. |组合键Key combination|结果Result| |---------------------|------------| |TabTAB|如果属性是`false`，将焦点移到下一个单元格的行中。If the property is `false`, the focus moves to the next cell in the row. 如果焦点位于行中的最后一个单元格，焦点将移到下一行中的第一个单元。If the focus is in the last cell in the row, the focus moves to the first cell in the next row. 如果焦点位于中的最后一个单元格，焦点会转移到下一个控件的 tab 键顺序。If the focus is in the last cell in the , the focus moves to the next control in the tab order.| |Shift+TabSHIFT+TAB|如果是`false`，将焦点移到上一个单元格的行中。If is `false`, the focus moves to the previous cell in the row. 如果焦点位于行中的第一个单元，焦点移到最后一个单元格上一行中。If the focus is in the first cell in the row, the focus moves to the last cell in the previous row. 如果焦点位于中的第一个单元格，焦点会转移到的上一个控件的 tab 键顺序。If the focus is in the first cell in the , the focus moves to the previous control in the tab order.| |Ctrl+TabCTRL+TAB|焦点移到下一个控件的 tab 键顺序。The focus moves to the next control in the tab order.|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 虚拟模式适用于使用与非常大的数据存储。Virtual mode is designed for use with very large stores of data. 当属性是`true`，创建具有一定的行和列，然后处理事件以填充单元格。When the property is `true`, you create a with a set number of rows and columns and then handle the event to populate the cells. 虚拟模式下需要实现的基础的数据缓存，以填充、 编辑和删除处理单元格基于用户的操作。Virtual mode requires implementation of an underlying data cache to handle the population, editing, and deletion of cells based on actions of the user. 有关实现虚拟模式的详细信息，请参阅[如何： 在 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中实现虚拟模式](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-implement-virtual-mode-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about implementing virtual mode, see [How to: Implement Virtual Mode in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-implement-virtual-mode-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). 您必须使用的虚拟模式来维护未绑定列的值时控件是否处于绑定模式。You must use virtual mode to maintain the values of unbound columns when the control is in bound mode. 不支持通过在绑定模式下的未绑定列进行排序。Sorting by unbound columns in bound mode is not supported. ## Examples 下面的代码示例代码使用虚拟模式下创建的表的正整数。The following code example code uses virtual mode to create a table of positive integers.
